 22 /**
 23  * Creates the calendar view controller.
 24  * @class
 25  * The strategy for the calendar is to leverage the list view stuff by creating a single
 26  * view (i.e. {@link ZmCalViewMgr}) and have it manage the schedule views (e.g. week, month) and
 27  * a single calendar view (the calendar widget to the right). Each of the schedule views
 28  * will be a list view that are managed by the {@link ZmCalViewMgr}.
 29  * <p>
 30  * To do this we have to trick the {@link ZmListController}. Specifically we have only one toolbar and
 31  * directly manipulate this._toolbar elements to point to a single instance of the toolbar. We also
 32  * directly override the {@link ZmListControl.initializeToolBar} method.
 33  *
 34  * @param {DwtComposite}				container					the containing element
 35  * @param {ZmCalendarApp}				calApp						the handle to the calendar application
 36  * @param {string}						sessionId					the session id
 37  * @param {ZmSearchResultsController}	searchResultsController		containing controller
 38  * 
 39  * @extends		ZmListController
 40  */
 41 ZmCalViewController = function(container, calApp, sessionId, searchResultsController) {
 42 
 43 	ZmListController.apply(this, arguments);
 44     
 45 	var apptListener = this._handleApptRespondAction.bind(this);
 46 	var apptEditListener = this._handleApptEditRespondAction.bind(this);
 47 
 48 	// get view based on op
 49 	ZmCalViewController.OP_TO_VIEW = {};
 50 	ZmCalViewController.OP_TO_VIEW[ZmOperation.DAY_VIEW]		= ZmId.VIEW_CAL_DAY;
 51 	ZmCalViewController.OP_TO_VIEW[ZmOperation.WEEK_VIEW]		= ZmId.VIEW_CAL_WEEK;
 52 	ZmCalViewController.OP_TO_VIEW[ZmOperation.WORK_WEEK_VIEW]	= ZmId.VIEW_CAL_WORK_WEEK;
 53 	ZmCalViewController.OP_TO_VIEW[ZmOperation.MONTH_VIEW]		= ZmId.VIEW_CAL_MONTH;
 54 	ZmCalViewController.OP_TO_VIEW[ZmOperation.CAL_LIST_VIEW]	= ZmId.VIEW_CAL_LIST;
 55 	ZmCalViewController.OP_TO_VIEW[ZmOperation.FB_VIEW]			= ZmId.VIEW_CAL_FB;
 56 
 57 	// get op based on view
 58 	ZmCalViewController.VIEW_TO_OP = {};
 59 	for (var op in ZmCalViewController.OP_TO_VIEW) {
 60 		ZmCalViewController.VIEW_TO_OP[ZmCalViewController.OP_TO_VIEW[op]] = op;
 61 	}
 62 
 63 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.REPLY_ACCEPT]			= apptListener;
 64 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.REPLY_DECLINE]			= apptListener;
 65 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.REPLY_TENTATIVE]		= apptListener;
 66 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.EDIT_REPLY_ACCEPT]		= apptEditListener;
 67 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.EDIT_REPLY_DECLINE]		= apptEditListener;
 68 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.EDIT_REPLY_TENTATIVE]	= apptEditListener;
 69 
 70 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.SHOW_ORIG]				= this._showOrigListener.bind(this);
 71 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.VIEW_APPOINTMENT]		= this._handleMenuViewAction.bind(this);
 72 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.OPEN_APPT_INSTANCE]		= this._handleMenuViewAction.bind(this);
 73 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.OPEN_APPT_SERIES]		= this._handleMenuViewAction.bind(this);
 74 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.TODAY]					= this._todayButtonListener.bind(this);
 75 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.NEW_APPT]				= this._newApptAction.bind(this);
 76 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.NEW_ALLDAY_APPT]		= this._newAllDayApptAction.bind(this);
 77 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.SEARCH_MAIL]			= this._searchMailAction.bind(this);
 78 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.MOVE]					= this._apptMoveListener.bind(this);
 79 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.DELETE_INSTANCE]		= this._deleteListener.bind(this);
 80 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.DELETE_SERIES]			= this._deleteListener.bind(this);
 81 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.FORWARD_APPT]			= this._forwardListener.bind(this);
 82     this._listeners[ZmOperation.PROPOSE_NEW_TIME]		= this._proposeTimeListener.bind(this);
 83     this._listeners[ZmOperation.REINVITE_ATTENDEES]		= this._reinviteAttendeesListener.bind(this);
 84 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.FORWARD_APPT_INSTANCE]	= this._forwardListener.bind(this);
 85 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.FORWARD_APPT_SERIES]	= this._forwardListener.bind(this);
 86 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.REPLY]					= this._replyListener.bind(this);
 87 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.REPLY_ALL]				= this._replyAllListener.bind(this);
 88 	this._listeners[ZmOperation.DUPLICATE_APPT]			= this._duplicateApptListener.bind(this);
 89     this._listeners[ZmOperation.PRINT_CALENDAR]			= this._printCalendarListener.bind(this);
 90 
 91 	this._treeSelectionListener = this._calTreeSelectionListener.bind(this);
 92 	this._maintTimedAction = new AjxTimedAction(this, this._maintenanceAction);
 93 	this._pendingWork = ZmCalViewController.MAINT_NONE;
 94 	this.apptCache = new ZmApptCache(this);
 95 	this._currentViewIdOverride = ZmId.VIEW_CAL;	// public view ID
 96 	
 97 	ZmCalViewController.OPS = [
 98 		ZmOperation.DAY_VIEW, ZmOperation.WORK_WEEK_VIEW, ZmOperation.WEEK_VIEW,
 99 		ZmOperation.MONTH_VIEW, ZmOperation.CAL_LIST_VIEW
100 	];
101     if (appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.FREE_BUSY_VIEW_ENABLED)) {
102         ZmCalViewController.OPS.push(ZmOperation.FB_VIEW);    
103     }
104 	var viewOpsListener = new AjxListener(this, this._viewActionMenuItemListener);
105 	for (var i = 0; i < ZmCalViewController.OPS.length; i++) {
106 		var op = ZmCalViewController.OPS[i];
107 		this._listeners[op] = viewOpsListener;
108 	}
109 	
110 	this._errorCallback = this._handleError.bind(this);
111 
112 	// needed by ZmCalListView:
113 	if (this.supportsDnD()) {
114 		this._dragSrc = new DwtDragSource(Dwt.DND_DROP_MOVE);
115 		this._dragSrc.addDragListener(this._dragListener.bind(this));
116 	}
117 	
118 	this._clearCacheFolderMap = {};
119 	this._apptSessionId = {};
120 };
121 
122 ZmCalViewController.prototype = new ZmListController;
123 ZmCalViewController.prototype.constructor = ZmCalViewController;

125 ZmCalViewController.prototype.isZmCalViewController = true;
126 ZmCalViewController.prototype.toString = function() { return "ZmCalViewController"; };

128 ZmCalViewController.DEFAULT_APPOINTMENT_DURATION = 30*60*1000;
129 
130 // maintenance needed on views and/or minical
131 ZmCalViewController.MAINT_NONE 		= 0x0; // no work to do
132 ZmCalViewController.MAINT_MINICAL 	= 0x1; // minical needs refresh
133 ZmCalViewController.MAINT_VIEW 		= 0x2; // view needs refresh
134 ZmCalViewController.MAINT_REMINDER	= 0x4; // reminders need refresh
135 
136 // get view based on op
137 ZmCalViewController.ACTION_CODE_TO_VIEW = {};
138 ZmCalViewController.ACTION_CODE_TO_VIEW[ZmKeyMap.CAL_DAY_VIEW]			= ZmId.VIEW_CAL_DAY;
139 ZmCalViewController.ACTION_CODE_TO_VIEW[ZmKeyMap.CAL_WEEK_VIEW]			= ZmId.VIEW_CAL_WEEK;
140 ZmCalViewController.ACTION_CODE_TO_VIEW[ZmKeyMap.CAL_WORK_WEEK_VIEW]	= ZmId.VIEW_CAL_WORK_WEEK;
141 ZmCalViewController.ACTION_CODE_TO_VIEW[ZmKeyMap.CAL_MONTH_VIEW]		= ZmId.VIEW_CAL_MONTH;
142 ZmCalViewController.ACTION_CODE_TO_VIEW[ZmKeyMap.CAL_LIST_VIEW]			= ZmId.VIEW_CAL_LIST;
143 ZmCalViewController.ACTION_CODE_TO_VIEW[ZmKeyMap.CAL_FB_VIEW]		    = ZmId.VIEW_CAL_FB;

145 ZmCalViewController.CHECKED_STATE_KEY = "CalendarsChecked";

147 // Zimlet hack
148 ZmCalViewController.prototype.postInitListeners =
149 function () {
150 	if (ZmZimlet.listeners && ZmZimlet.listeners["ZmCalViewController"]) {
151 		for(var ix in ZmZimlet.listeners["ZmCalViewController"]) {
152 			if(ZmZimlet.listeners["ZmCalViewController"][ix] instanceof AjxListener) {
153 				this._listeners[ix] = ZmZimlet.listeners["ZmCalViewController"][ix];
154 			} else {
155 				this._listeners[ix] = new AjxListener(this, ZmZimlet.listeners["ZmCalViewController"][ix]);
156 			}
157 		}
158 	}
159 };
160 
161 ZmCalViewController.getDefaultViewType =
162 function() {
163 	var setting = appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.CALENDAR_INITIAL_VIEW);
164     //This if loop has to be removed once bug 68708 is fixed
165     if(setting === "schedule"){
166         setting = ZmSetting.CAL_DAY;//Assigning day view as default view instead of schedule view as it is removed
167     }
168 	return ZmCalendarApp.VIEW_FOR_SETTING[setting] || ZmId.VIEW_CAL_WORK_WEEK;
169 };
170 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getDefaultViewType = ZmCalViewController.getDefaultViewType;
171 
172 /**
173  * Gets the first day of week setting.
174  * 
175  * @return	{int}	the first day of week index
176  */
177 ZmCalViewController.prototype.firstDayOfWeek =
178 function() {
179 	return appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.CAL_FIRST_DAY_OF_WEEK) || 0;
180 };
181 
182 ZmCalViewController.prototype.setCurrentViewId =
183 function(viewId) {
184     if (viewId != ZmId.VIEW_CAL) {
185         // Only store a real view id; VIEW_CAL is a placeholder used to identity the
186         // constellation of calendar views to the AppViewMgr.  Cal views are handled
187         // by their own ZmCalViewMgr.
188         ZmController.prototype.setCurrentViewId.call(this, viewId);
189     }
190 };
191 
192 ZmCalViewController.prototype.show =
193 function(viewId, startDate, skipMaintenance) {
194 	AjxDispatcher.require(["MailCore", "CalendarCore", "Calendar"]);
195 	DBG.println(AjxDebug.DBG1, "ZmCalViewController.show, viewId = " + viewId);
196 	if (!viewId || viewId == ZmId.VIEW_CAL) {
197 		viewId = this.getCurrentViewType() || this.getDefaultViewType();
198 	}
199 
200 	if (!this._viewMgr) {
201 		this.createViewMgr(startDate);
202 		this._setup(viewId); // TODO: Needed? Wouldn't this be handled by next conditional?
203 	}
204 
205 	if (!this._viewMgr.getView(viewId)) {
206 		this._setup(viewId);
207 	}
208 
209 	this._viewMgr.setView(viewId);
210 	DBG.timePt("setup and set view");
211 
212 	var elements = this.getViewElements(ZmId.VIEW_CAL, this._viewMgr);
213 
214     this._setView({ view:		ZmId.VIEW_CAL,
215 					viewType:	this._currentViewType,
216 					elements:	elements,
217 					isAppView:	true});
218     this._currentViewId = this._currentViewType = this._viewMgr.getCurrentViewName();
219 
220     this.setCurrentListView(null);
221 	this._listView[this._currentViewId] = this._viewMgr.getCurrentView();
222 	this._resetToolbarOperations(viewId);
223 
224 
225 	DBG.timePt("switching selection mode and tooltips");
226 
227     switch(viewId) {
228         case ZmId.VIEW_CAL_DAY:
229             this._miniCalendar.setSelectionMode(DwtCalendar.DAY);
230             this._navToolBar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL].setToolTip(ZmOperation.PAGE_BACK, ZmMsg.previousDay);
231             this._navToolBar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL].setToolTip(ZmOperation.PAGE_FORWARD, ZmMsg.nextDay);
232             break;
233         case ZmId.VIEW_CAL_WORK_WEEK:
234             this._miniCalendar.setSelectionMode(DwtCalendar.WORK_WEEK);
235             this._navToolBar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL].setToolTip(ZmOperation.PAGE_BACK, ZmMsg.previousWorkWeek);
236             this._navToolBar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL].setToolTip(ZmOperation.PAGE_FORWARD, ZmMsg.nextWorkWeek);
237             break;
238         case ZmId.VIEW_CAL_WEEK:
239             this._miniCalendar.setSelectionMode(DwtCalendar.WEEK);
240             this._navToolBar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL].setToolTip(ZmOperation.PAGE_BACK, ZmMsg.previousWeek);
241             this._navToolBar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL].setToolTip(ZmOperation.PAGE_FORWARD, ZmMsg.nextWeek);
242             break;
243         case ZmId.VIEW_CAL_MONTH:
244             // use day until month does something
245             this._miniCalendar.setSelectionMode(DwtCalendar.DAY);
246             this._navToolBar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL].setToolTip(ZmOperation.PAGE_BACK, ZmMsg.previousMonth);
247             this._navToolBar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL].setToolTip(ZmOperation.PAGE_FORWARD, ZmMsg.nextMonth);
248             break;
249         case ZmId.VIEW_CAL_LIST:
250             this._miniCalendar.setSelectionMode(DwtCalendar.DAY);
251             break;
252     }
253     if (viewId == ZmId.VIEW_CAL_LIST) {
254 		this._navToolBar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL].setVisible(false);
255 	} else {
256         if(viewId!=ZmId.VIEW_CAL_MONTH){this._viewMgr.getView(viewId).initializeTimeScroll();}
257 		this._navToolBar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL].setVisible(true);
258 		var cv = this._viewMgr.getCurrentView();
259 		var navText = viewId == ZmId.VIEW_CAL_MONTH
260 			? cv.getShortCalTitle()
261 			: cv.getCalTitle();
262 		this._navToolBar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL].setText(navText);
263 		DBG.println(AjxDebug.DBG1, "ZmCalViewController.show, skipMaintenance = " + skipMaintenance);
264 		if (!skipMaintenance) {
265 			var work = ZmCalViewController.MAINT_VIEW;
266 			if (window.inlineCalSearchResponse) {
267 				this.processInlineCalSearch();
268 				window.inlineCalSearchResponse = null;
269 				work = ZmCalViewController.MAINT_MINICAL|ZmCalViewController.MAINT_VIEW|ZmCalViewController.MAINT_REMINDER;
270 			}
271 			this._scheduleMaintenance(work);
272 		}
273         if (!this.isSearchResults) {
274             this.updateTimeIndicator(viewId);
275         }
276 		DBG.timePt("scheduling maintenance");
277 	}
278 
279 	// do this last
280 	if (!this._calTreeController) {
281 		this._calTreeController = appCtxt.getOverviewController().getTreeController(ZmOrganizer.CALENDAR);
282 		if (this._calTreeController) {
283 			if (appCtxt.multiAccounts) {
284 				var overviews = this._app.getOverviewContainer().getOverviews();
285 				for (var i in overviews) {
286 					this._calTreeController.addSelectionListener(i, this._treeSelectionListener);
287 				}
288 			} else {
289 				this._calTreeController.addSelectionListener(this._app.getOverviewId(), this._treeSelectionListener);
290 			}
291 			var calTree = appCtxt.getFolderTree();
292 			if (calTree) {
293 				calTree.addChangeListener(new AjxListener(this, this._calTreeChangeListener));
294 			}
295 		}
296 		DBG.timePt("getting tree controller", true);
297 	}
298 };
299 
300 /**
301  * Updates the time indicator strip.
302  *
303  */
304 ZmCalViewController.prototype.updateTimeIndicator =
305 function(viewId) {
306     viewId = viewId || this.getCurrentViewType();
307     this._viewMgr.getView(viewId).startIndicatorTimer(this.isSearchResults);
308 };

310 /**
311  * Gets the calendar tree controller.
312  *
313  * @return	{ZmCalendarTreeController}		the controller
314  */
315 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getCalTreeController =
316 function() {
317 	return this._calTreeController;
318 };
319 
320 ZmCalViewController.prototype.createViewMgr =
321 function(startDate) {
322 	var newDate = startDate || (this._miniCalendar ? this._miniCalendar.getDate() : new Date());
323 
324 	if (!this._miniCalendar) {
325 		this._createMiniCalendar(newDate);
326 	}
327 
328 	this._viewMgr = new ZmCalViewMgr(this._container, this, this._dropTgt);
329 	this._viewMgr.setDate(newDate);
330 	this._viewMgr.addTimeSelectionListener(new AjxListener(this, this._timeSelectionListener));
331 	this._viewMgr.addDateRangeListener(new AjxListener(this, this._dateRangeListener));
332 	this._viewMgr.addViewActionListener(new AjxListener(this, this._viewActionListener));
333 	DBG.timePt("created view manager");
334 };

336 /**
337  * Gets the checked calendars.
338  * 
339  * @param	{String}	overviewId		the overview id
340  * @return	{Array}		an array of {ZmCalendar} objects
341  */
342 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getCheckedCalendars =
343 function(includeTrash) {
344 	if (!this._checkedCalendars) {
345 		this._updateCheckedCalendars();
346 	}
347     return includeTrash ? this._checkedCalendarsAll : this._checkedCalendars;
348 };
349 
350 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getMainAccountCheckedCalendarIds =
351 function() {
352     if (!this._checkedAccountCalendarIds) {
353         // Generate the checked calendar data
354         this._updateCheckedCalendars();
355     }
356     // If there are any account calendar ids, the 0th should be the main account - copy its checked calendars
357     return (this._checkedAccountCalendarIds.length == 0) ? [] : this._checkedAccountCalendarIds[0].slice(0);
358 }
359 
360 // Called whether starting on or offline
361 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getOfflineSearchCalendarIds =
362 function() {
363     if (!this._offlineSearchCalendarIds) {
364 
365         var checkedCalendarHash = null;
366         if (appCtxt.isWebClientOffline()) {
367             checkedCalendarHash = this._retrieveCalendarCheckedState();
368         }
369 
370         // Generate the checked calendar data - this will also store the calendar entries, if we are starting up online
371         this._updateCheckedCalendars(checkedCalendarHash);
372     }
373     return (this._offlineSearchCalendarIds);
374 }
375 
376 ZmCalViewController.prototype._storeCalendarCheckedState =
377 function() {
378     // if !offline, store which calendars are currently checked, in localStorage.  This will be updated
379     // while running, and reloaded if the app starts in offline mode.
380     var calendarCheckedState = this._checkedCalendarIds.join(":");
381     localStorage.setItem(ZmCalendarApp.CHECKED_STATE_KEY, calendarCheckedState);
382 }
383 
384 
385 ZmCalViewController.prototype._retrieveCalendarCheckedState =
386 function() {
387     // Starting up offline, retrieve the stored calendar checked state
388     var checkedStateText = localStorage.getItem(ZmCalendarApp.CHECKED_STATE_KEY);
389     var checkedCalendarFolderIds = checkedStateText.split(":");
390     var checkedCalendarHash = {};
391     for (var i = 0; i < checkedCalendarFolderIds.length; i++) {
392         checkedCalendarHash[checkedCalendarFolderIds[i]] = true;
393     }
394     return checkedCalendarHash;
395 }
396 
397 
398 /**
399  * Gets the unchecked calendar folder ids for a owner email
400  *
401  * @param	{String}	ownerEmailId		email id of the owner account
402  * @return	{Array}		an array of folder ids
403  */
404 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getUncheckedCalendarIdsByOwner =
405 function(ownerEmailId) {
406 	var dataTree = appCtxt.getTree(ZmId.ORG_CALENDAR, appCtxt.getActiveAccount()),
407         calendars = dataTree.getByType(ZmId.ORG_CALENDAR),
408         len = calendars.length,
409         calIds = [],
410         calendar,
411         i;
412 
413     for (i=0; i<len; i++) {
414         calendar = calendars[i];
415         if(!calendar.isChecked && calendar.owner && calendar.owner == ownerEmailId) {
416             calIds.push(calendar.id);
417         }
418     }
419     return calIds;
420 };
421 
422 /**
423  * Gets the checked calendar folder ids.
424  * 
425  * @param	{Boolean}	localOnly		if <code>true</code>, include local calendars only
426  * @return	{Array}		an array of folder ids
427  */
428 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getCheckedCalendarFolderIds =
429 function(localOnly, includeTrash) {
430 	if (!this._checkedCalendarIds) {
431 		this.getCheckedCalendars(includeTrash);
432 		if (!this._checkedCalendarIds) {
433 			return [ZmOrganizer.ID_CALENDAR];
434 		}
435 	}
436     // TODO: Do we also need to handle includeTrash here?
437 	return localOnly
438 		? this._checkedLocalCalendarIds
439 		: this._checkedCalendarIds;
440 };
441 
442 /**
443  * Gets the checked calendar folder ids.
444  *
445  * @param	{Boolean}	localOnly		if <code>true</code>, include local calendars only
446  * @return	{Array}		an array of folder ids
447  */
448 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getOwnedCalendarIds =
449 function(email, includeTrash) {
450     var i,
451         cal,
452         calendars,
453         calIds = [];
454     if(!this._calTreeController) {
455         this._calTreeController = appCtxt.getOverviewController().getTreeController(ZmOrganizer.CALENDAR);
456     }
457 
458     calendars = this._calTreeController.getOwnedCalendars(this._app.getOverviewId(), email);
459     for (i = 0; i < calendars.length; i++) {
460         cal = calendars[i];
461         if (cal) {
462             if(!includeTrash && (cal.nId == ZmFolder.ID_TRASH)) { continue; }
463             calIds.push(appCtxt.multiAccounts ? cal.id : cal.nId);
464         }
465     }
466 
467 	return calIds;
468 };
469 
470 /**
471  * Gets the calendar folder ids used to create reminders.
472  * All local calendars and shared calendars with the reminder flag set, checked or unchecked.
473  * Does not include the trash folder.
474  *
475  * @return	{Array}		an array of folder ids
476  */
477 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getReminderCalendarFolderIds =
478 function() {
479 	if (!this._reminderCalendarIds) {
480 		this._updateCheckedCalendars();
481 		if (!this._reminderCalendarIds) {
482 			return [ZmOrganizer.ID_CALENDAR];
483 		}
484 	}
485 	return this._reminderCalendarIds;
486 };
487 
488 /**
489  * Gets the checked organizers.
490  *
491  * @return {Array} array of {ZmOrganizer}
492  */
493 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getCheckedOrganizers = function(includeTrash, acct) {
494     var controller = appCtxt.getOverviewController();
495     var overviewId = appCtxt.getApp(ZmApp.CALENDAR).getOverviewId(acct);
496     var treeId = ZmOrganizer.CALENDAR;
497     var treeView = controller.getTreeView(overviewId, treeId);
498     var organizers = treeView.getSelected();
499     if (!includeTrash) {
500         for (var i = 0; i < organizers.length; i++) {
501             if (organizers[i].id == ZmOrganizer.ID_TRASH) {
502                 organizers.splice(i, 1);
503                 break;
504             }
505         }
506     }
507     return organizers;
508 };
509 
510 /**
511  * Gets the checked organizer IDs.
512  *
513  * @return {Array} array of strings
514  */
515 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getCheckedOrganizerIds = function() {
516     return AjxUtil.map(this.getCheckedOrganizers(), ZmCalViewController.__map_id);
517 };
518 ZmCalViewController.__map_id = function(item) {
519     return item.id;
520 };
521 
522 ZmCalViewController.prototype._updateCheckedCalendars =
523 function(checkedCalendarHash) {
524     var allCalendars = [];
525 	if (this._calTreeController) {
526 		if (appCtxt.multiAccounts) {
527 			var overviews = this._app.getOverviewContainer().getOverviews();
528 			for (var i in overviews) {
529 				allCalendars = allCalendars.concat(this._calTreeController.getCalendars(i));
530 			}
531 		} else {
532 			// bug fix #25512 - avoid race condition
533 			if (!this._app._overviewPanelContent) {
534 				this._app.setOverviewPanelContent(true);
535 			}
536 			allCalendars = this._calTreeController.getCalendars(this._app.getOverviewId());
537 		}
538 	} else {
539 		this._app._createDeferredFolders(ZmApp.CALENDAR);
540         var ac = window.parentAppCtxt || window.appCtxt;
541 		var list = ac.accountList.visibleAccounts;
542 		for (var i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
543 			var acct = list[i];
544 			if (!ac.get(ZmSetting.CALENDAR_ENABLED, null, acct)) { continue; }
545 
546 			var folderTree = ac.getFolderTree(acct);
547 			var calendars = folderTree && folderTree.getByType(ZmOrganizer.CALENDAR);
548 			if (calendars) {
549 				for (var j = 0; j < calendars.length; j++) {
550 					// bug: 43067: skip the default calendar for caldav based accounts
551 					if (acct.isCalDavBased() && calendars[j].nId == ZmOrganizer.ID_CALENDAR) {
552 						continue;
553 					}
554 					allCalendars.push(calendars[j]);
555 				}
556 			}
557 		}
558 	}
559 
560     this._checkedCalendars = [];
561     this._checkedCalendarIds = [];
562     this._checkedLocalCalendarIds = [];
563     this._checkedAccountCalendarIds = [];
564     this._offlineSearchCalendarIds = [];
565     this._reminderCalendarIds = [];
566     var checkedAccountCalendarIds = {};
567     var trashFolder = null;
568     for (var i = 0; i < allCalendars.length; i++) {
569         var cal = allCalendars[i];
570         if (!cal.noSuchFolder) {
571             this._offlineSearchCalendarIds.push(cal.id);
572         }
573         if (!cal.noSuchFolder && (cal.id != ZmOrganizer.ID_TRASH) &&
574             (cal.isRemote && !cal.isRemote())) {
575             this._reminderCalendarIds.push(cal.id);
576         }
577         var checked = cal.isChecked;
578         if (checkedCalendarHash) {
579             // LocalStorage values passed in upon offline startup, use those
580             checked = checkedCalendarHash[cal.id] ? true : false;
581             cal.isChecked = checked;
582         }
583         if (checked) {
584             if (cal.id == ZmOrganizer.ID_TRASH) {
585                 trashFolder = cal;
586             } else {
587                 this._checkedCalendars.push(cal);
588             }
589             if (!cal.noSuchFolder) {
590                 this._checkedCalendarIds.push(cal.id);
591                 if (cal.isRemote && !cal.isRemote()) {
592                     this._checkedLocalCalendarIds.push(cal.id);
593                 }
594                 var acctId = (appCtxt.multiAccounts) ? cal.getAccount().id : appCtxt.accountList.mainAccount.id;
595                 if (!checkedAccountCalendarIds[acctId]) {
596                     checkedAccountCalendarIds[acctId] = [];
597                 }
598                 checkedAccountCalendarIds[acctId].push(cal.id);
599             }
600         }
601     }
602 
603     this._checkedCalendarsAll = trashFolder ? this._checkedCalendars.concat(trashFolder) : this._checkedCalendars;
604 
605     // convert hash to local array
606     for (var i in checkedAccountCalendarIds) {
607         this._checkedAccountCalendarIds.push(checkedAccountCalendarIds[i]);
608     }
609 
610     if (!checkedCalendarHash) {
611         // Not the initial call, update the stored calendar info.  Note this will be called when calendars are
612         // checked/unchecked by the user (online or offline), and when notifications modifying the calendars
613         // are received.
614         this._storeCalendarCheckedState();
615     }
616 
617     // return list of checked calendars
618     return this._checkedCalendars;
619 };
620 
621 ZmCalViewController.prototype._calTreeSelectionListener =
622 function(ev) {
623 	if (ev.detail != DwtTree.ITEM_CHECKED) { return; }
624 
625     // NOTE: This isn't called by the cal tree controller in all cases so
626     // NOTE: we need to make sure the checked calendar list is up-to-date.
627 	this._updateCheckedCalendars();
628 
629 	if (!this._calItemStatus) {
630 		this._calItemStatus = {};
631 	}
632 
633 	if (ev.item) {
634         var organizer = ev.item.getData && ev.item.getData(Dwt.KEY_OBJECT);
635         if (organizer && organizer.nId == ZmOrganizer.ID_TRASH) {
636             var found = false;
637             var acct = organizer.getAccount();
638             var organizers = this.getCheckedOrganizers(true, acct);
639             for (var i = 0; i < organizers.length; i++) {
640                 var id = organizers[i].nId;
641                 if (id == ZmOrganizer.ID_TRASH) {
642                     found = true;
643                     break;
644                 }
645             }
646             this._viewMgr.setSubContentVisible(found);
647             return;
648         }
649 		ev.items = [ ev.item ];
650 	}
651 	if (ev.items && ev.items.length) {
652 		for (var i = 0; i < ev.items.length; i++) {
653 			var item = ev.items[i];
654 			this.__addCalItemStatus(item, item.getChecked());
655 		}
656 	}
657 
658 	// update calendar state on time delay to avoid race condition
659 	if (!this._updateCalItemStateActionId) {
660 		this._updateCalItemStateActionId = AjxTimedAction.scheduleAction(new AjxTimedAction(this, this._updateCalItemState), 1200);
661 	}
662 };
663 
664 ZmCalViewController.prototype.__addCalItemStatus =
665 function(item, checked) {
666 	item.setChecked(checked);
667 	var organizer = item.getData(Dwt.KEY_OBJECT);
668 	if (organizer && organizer.type == ZmOrganizer.CALENDAR) {
669         AjxDebug.println(AjxDebug.CALENDAR, " ---------------- calendar " +  organizer.name + " [" + organizer.id + "] is " + (checked ? "checked" : "unchecked"));
670 		this._calItemStatus[organizer.id] = {item: organizer, checked: checked};
671 	}
672 
673 	// bug 6410
674 	var items = item.getItems();
675 	for (var i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
676 		item = items[i];
677 		this.__addCalItemStatus(item, checked);
678 	}
679 };
680 
681 ZmCalViewController.prototype._updateCalItemState =
682 function() {
683 	if (!this._calItemStatus) { return; }
684 
685 	var accountName = appCtxt.isOffline && appCtxt.accountList.mainAccount.name;
686 	var batchCmd = new ZmBatchCommand(null, accountName, true);
687 	var itemCount = 0;
688     for (var i in this._calItemStatus) {
689         var info = this._calItemStatus[i];
690         if (info.item) {
691             var calendar = info.item;
692             //If, Remote Calendars & not mount-points, dont send check/uncheck requests
693             if ((calendar.isRemote() && (!calendar.isMountpoint || !calendar.zid))) {
694                 calendar.isChecked = info.checked;
695                 calendar.checkedCallback(info.checked);
696                 this._handleCheckedCalendarRefresh(calendar);
697             } else {
698                 batchCmd.add(new AjxCallback(calendar, calendar.checkAction, [info.checked]));
699                 itemCount++;
700             }
701         }
702     }
703 
704     if (appCtxt.multiAccounts) {
705         this.apptCache.clearCache();
706     }
707 
708     if (itemCount > 0) {
709         if (appCtxt.isWebClientOffline()) {
710             // The offlineCallback gets bound inside batchCmd.run to this
711             var offlineCallback = this._handleOfflineCalendarCheck.bind(this, batchCmd);
712             batchCmd.run(null, null, offlineCallback);
713         } else {
714             this._calItemStatus = {};
715             batchCmd.run();
716         }
717     }
718 
719 	this._updateCalItemStateActionId = null;
720 };
721 
722 // Update the check change locally (a folder and its subfolders) and store the batch command into the request queue
723 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleOfflineCalendarCheck =
724 function(batchCmd) {
725 
726     // Json batchCommand created in _updaetCalItemState above.  Must be Json to be stored in offline request queue
727     var jsonObj = batchCmd.getRequestBody();
728 
729     this.apptCache.clearCache();
730     // Apply the changes locally
731     var calendarIds = [];
732     for (var i in this._calItemStatus) {
733         var info = this._calItemStatus[i];
734         if (info.item) {
735             var calendar = info.item;
736             calendarIds.push(calendar.id);
737             // Remote non-mountpoint has aleady been processed for local display - ignore it
738             if (!(calendar.isRemote() && (!calendar.isMountpoint || !calendar.zid))) {
739                 calendar.isChecked = info.checked;
740                 calendar.checkedCallback(info.checked);
741                 this._handleCheckedCalendarRefresh(calendar);
742             }
743         }
744     }
745      this._calItemStatus = {};
746 
747     // Store the request for playback
748     var jsonObjCopy = $.extend(true, {}, jsonObj);  //Always clone the object.  ?? Needed here ??
749     // This should be the only BatchCommand queued for calendars for replay (for the FolderAction, checked).
750     jsonObjCopy.methodName = "BatchRequest";
751     // Modify the id to thwart ZmOffline._handleResponseSendOfflineRequest, which sends a DELETE
752     // notification for the id - so a single calendar would get deleted in the UI
753     jsonObjCopy.id = "C" + calendarIds.join(":");
754     var value = {
755         update:          true,
756         methodName:      jsonObjCopy.methodName,
757         id:              jsonObjCopy.id,
758         value:           jsonObjCopy
759     };
760 
761     // No callback - we apply the check changes, whether or not the request goes into the queue successfully
762     ZmOfflineDB.setItemInRequestQueue(value);
763 };

769 	this._refreshAction(true);

772 ZmCalViewController.prototype._calTreeChangeListener =
773 function(ev) {
774 	if (ev.event == ZmEvent.E_DELETE) {
775 		this._updateCheckedCalendars();
776 	}
777     if (ev.event == ZmEvent.E_MODIFY) {
778         var details = ev.getDetails(),
779             fields = details ? details.fields : null;
780 
781         if (fields && (fields[ZmOrganizer.F_COLOR] || fields[ZmOrganizer.F_RGB])) {
782             this._refreshAction(true);
783         }
784 	}

803 /**
804  * Gets the calendar for the specified account.
805  *
806  * @param   {Hash}      params              Param hash
807  * @param	{Boolean}	params.includeLinks	if <code>true</code>, include links
808  * @param   {Boolean}   params.onlyWritable if <code>true</code> only writable calendars
809  * @param	{ZmAccount}	params.account		the account
810  * @return	{Array}	an array of {ZmCalendar} objects
811  */
812 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getCalendars =
813 function(params) {
814 	params = params || {};
815 	var account = params.account;
816 	var includeLinks = params.includeLinks;
817 	var onlyWritable = params.onlyWritable;
818 	this._updateCheckedCalendars();
819 	var calendars = [];
820 	var organizers = appCtxt.getFolderTree(account).getByType(ZmOrganizer.CALENDAR);
821 	for (var i = 0; i < organizers.length; i++) {
822 		var organizer = organizers[i];
823 		if ((organizer.zid && !includeLinks) ||
824 			(appCtxt.multiAccounts &&
825 			 organizer.nId == ZmOrganizer.ID_CALENDAR &&
826 			 organizer.getAccount().isCalDavBased()))
827 		{
828 			continue;
829 		}
830 
831 		if (account && organizer.getAccount() != account) { continue; }
832 
833 		if (onlyWritable && organizer.isReadOnly()) continue;
834 
835 		calendars.push(organizer);
836 	}
837 	calendars.sort(ZmCalViewController.__BY_NAME);
838 	return calendars;
839 };
840 
841 ZmCalViewController.__BY_NAME =
842 function(a, b) {
843 	return a.name.localeCompare(b.name);
844 };

858 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getCalendarColor =
859 function(folderId) {
860 	if (!folderId) { return ZmOrganizer.DEFAULT_COLOR[ZmOrganizer.CALENDAR]; }
861 	var cal = this.getCalendar(folderId);
862 	return cal ? cal.color : ZmOrganizer.DEFAULT_COLOR[ZmOrganizer.CALENDAR];
863 };

865 ZmCalViewController.prototype._refreshButtonListener =
866 function(ev) {
867 	//Return if a search is already in progress
868 	if (this.searchInProgress) {
869 		return;
870 	}
871     this.setCurrentListView(null);
872     
873 	// bug fix #33830 - force sync for calendar refresh
874 	if (appCtxt.isOffline) {
875 		appCtxt.accountList.syncAll();
876 	}
877 
878 	var app = appCtxt.getApp(ZmApp.CALENDAR);
879 	// reset possibly set user query
880 	this._userQuery = null;
881 	if (app === appCtxt.getCurrentApp()) {
882 		var sc = appCtxt.getSearchController();
883 		sc.setSearchField("");
884 		sc.getSearchToolbar().blur();
885 	}
886 	app.currentSearch = null;
887 	app.currentQuery = null;
888 	this._refreshMaintenance = true;
889     this.searchInProgress = false;
890 	this._refreshAction(false);
891 
892 	var overview = appCtxt.getOverviewController().getOverview(app.getOverviewId());
893 	if (overview) {
894 		overview.clearSelection();
895 	}
896 
897 };

899 // Move button has been pressed, show the dialog.
900 ZmCalViewController.prototype._apptMoveListener =
901 function(ev) {
902 	var items = this.getSelection();
903 	var divvied = (items.length > 1) ? this._divvyItems(items) : null;
904 
905 	if (divvied && divvied.readonly.length > 0) {
906 		var dlg = appCtxt.getMsgDialog();
907 		var list = [];
908 		if (divvied.normal.length > 0) {
909 			list = list.concat(divvied.normal);
910 		}
911 		if (divvied.recurring.length > 0) {
912 			list = list.concat(this._dedupeSeries(divvied.recurring));
913 		}
914 		var callback = (list.length > 0)
915 			? (new AjxCallback(this, this._moveListener, [ev, list])) : null;
916 		var listener = new AjxListener(this, this._handleReadonlyOk, [callback, dlg]);
917 		dlg.setButtonListener(DwtDialog.OK_BUTTON, listener);
918 		dlg.setMessage(ZmMsg.moveReadonly);
919 		dlg.popup();
920 	}
921 	else {
922 		this._moveListener(ev, this._dedupeSeries(items));
923 	}
924 };

931 ZmCalViewController.prototype._moveCallback =
932 function(folder) {
933 	if (this.isMovingBetwAccounts(this._pendingActionData, folder.id)) {
934         var dlg = appCtxt.getMsgDialog();
935         dlg.setMessage(ZmMsg.orgChange, DwtMessageDialog.WARNING_STYLE);
936         dlg.popup();
937         return false;
938     }else if (this.isMovingBetwAcctsAsAttendee(this._pendingActionData, folder.id)) {
939 		var dlg = appCtxt.getMsgDialog();
940 		dlg.setMessage(ZmMsg.apptInviteOnly, DwtMessageDialog.WARNING_STYLE);
941 		dlg.popup();
942 	} else {
943 		this._doMove(this._pendingActionData, folder, null, false);
944 		this._clearDialog(appCtxt.getChooseFolderDialog());
945 		this._pendingActionData = null;
946 	}
947 };

955 ZmCalViewController.prototype._doTag =
956 function(items, tag, doTag) {
957 
958 	var list = this._getTaggableItems(items);
959 
960 	if (doTag) {
961 		if (list.length > 0 && list.length == items.length) {
962 			// there are items to tag, and all are taggable
963 			ZmListController.prototype._doTag.call(this, list, tag, doTag);
964 		} else {
965 			var msg;
966 			var dlg = appCtxt.getMsgDialog();
967 			if (list.length > 0 && list.length < items.length) {
968 				// there are taggable and nontaggable items
969 				var listener = new AjxListener(this, this._handleDoTag, [dlg, list, tag, doTag]);
970 				dlg.setButtonListener(DwtDialog.OK_BUTTON, listener);
971 				msg = ZmMsg.tagReadonly;
972 			} else if (list.length == 0) {
973 				// no taggable items
974 				msg = ZmMsg.nothingToTag;
975 			}
976 			dlg.setMessage(msg);
977 			dlg.popup();
978 		}
979 	} else if (list.length > 0) {
980 		ZmListController.prototype._doTag.call(this, list, tag, doTag);
981 	}
982 };
983

985 function(items) {
986 	var list = this._getTaggableItems(items);
987 	ZmListController.prototype._doRemoveAllTags.call(this, list);
988 };

990 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleDoTag =
991 function(dlg, list, tag, doTag) {
992 	dlg.popdown();
993 	ZmListController.prototype._doTag.call(this, list, tag, doTag);
994 };

996 ZmCalViewController.prototype._getTaggableItems =
997 function(items) {
998 	var divvied = (items.length > 1) ? this._divvyItems(items) : null;
999 
1000 	if (divvied && (divvied.readonly.length > 0 || divvied.shared.length > 0)) {
1001 		// get a list of items that are "taggable"
1002 		items = [];
1003 		for (var i in divvied) {
1004 			// we process read only appts b/c it can also mean any appt where
1005 			// i'm not the organizer but still resides in my local folder.
1006 			if (i == "shared") { continue; }
1007 
1008 			var list = divvied[i];
1009 			for (var j = 0; j < list.length; j++) {
1010 				var appt = list[j];
1011 				var calendar = appt.getFolder();
1012 				if (calendar && !calendar.isRemote()) {
1013 					items.push(appt);
1014 				}
1015 			}
1016 		}
1017 	}
1018 
1019 	return items;
1020 };

1044 /* This method is called from ZmListController._setup. We control when this method is called in our
1045  * show method. We ensure it is only called once i.e the first time show is called
1046  */
1047 ZmCalViewController.prototype._initializeToolBar =
1048 function(viewId) {
1049 	if (this._toolbar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL]) { return; }
1050 
1051 	ZmListController.prototype._initializeToolBar.call(this, ZmId.VIEW_CAL_DAY);
1052 	var toolbar = this._toolbar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL_DAY];
1053 
1054 	// Set the other view toolbar entries to point to the Day view entry. Hack
1055 	// to fool the ZmListController into thinking there are multiple toolbars
1056     this._toolbar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL_FB] = this._toolbar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL_WEEK] =
1057 	this._toolbar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL_WORK_WEEK] = this._toolbar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL_MONTH] =
1058 	this._toolbar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL_LIST] = this._toolbar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL_DAY];
1059 
1060 	this._toolbar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL] = toolbar;
1061 
1062 	// Setup the toolbar stuff
1063 	toolbar.enable([ZmOperation.PAGE_BACK, ZmOperation.PAGE_FORWARD], true);
1064 	toolbar.enable([ZmOperation.WEEK_VIEW, ZmOperation.MONTH_VIEW, ZmOperation.DAY_VIEW], true);
1065 
1066 	//toolbar.addFiller();
1067 
1068 	var tb = new ZmNavToolBar({parent:toolbar, className:"ZmNavToolbar ZmCalendarNavToolbar", context:ZmId.VIEW_CAL, posStyle:Dwt.ABSOLUTE_STYLE});
1069 	this._setNavToolBar(tb, ZmId.VIEW_CAL);
1070 
1071 	var printButton = toolbar.getButton(ZmOperation.PRINT_CALENDAR);
1072 	if (printButton) {
1073 		printButton.setToolTipContent(ZmMsg.printCalendar);
1074 	}
1075 
1076 	toolbar.getButton(ZmOperation.DELETE).setToolTipContent(ZmMsg.hardDeleteTooltip);
1077 
1078 	appCtxt.notifyZimlets("initializeToolbar", [this._app, toolbar, this, viewId], {waitUntilLoaded:true});
1079 };

1132 /**
1133  * Creates the mini-calendar widget that sits below the overview.
1134  * 
1135  * @param {Date}		date		the date to highlight (defaults to today)
1136  * @private
1137  */
1138 ZmCalViewController.prototype._createMiniCalendar =
1139 function(date) {
1140 	var calMgr = appCtxt.getCalManager();
1141 	if (calMgr._miniCalendar == null) {
1142 		calMgr._createMiniCalendar(date);
1143 		this._miniCalendar = calMgr.getMiniCalendar();
1144 	} else {
1145 		this._miniCalendar = calMgr.getMiniCalendar();
1146 		if (date != null) {
1147 			this._miniCalendar.setDate(date, true);
1148 		}
1149 	}
1150 	this._minicalMenu = calMgr._miniCalMenu;
1151 	this._miniCalDropTarget = calMgr._miniCalDropTarget;
1152 };
1153 
1154 ZmCalViewController.prototype.recreateMiniCalendar =
1155 function() {
1156 	var calMgr = appCtxt.getCalManager();
1157 	if (calMgr._miniCalendar != null) {
1158 		var mc = calMgr.getMiniCalendar();
1159 		var el = mc.getHtmlElement();
1160 		var date = mc.getDate();
1161 		if(el) {
1162 			el.parentNode.removeChild(el);
1163 		}
1164 		this._miniCalendar = null;
1165 		calMgr._miniCalendar = null;
1166 		calMgr._createMiniCalendar(date);
1167 		this._miniCalendar = calMgr.getMiniCalendar();
1168 		this._createMiniCalendar();
1169 	}
1170 };

1172 ZmCalViewController.prototype._miniCalDropTargetListener =
1173 function(ev) {
1174 
1175 	if (appCtxt.isWebClientOffline()) return;
1176 
1177 	var data = ((ev.srcData.data instanceof Array) && ev.srcData.data.length == 1)
1178 	? ev.srcData.data[0] : ev.srcData.data;
1179 
1180 	// use shiftKey to create new Tasks if enabled. NOTE: does not support Contacts yet
1181 	var shiftKey = appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.TASKS_ENABLED) && ev.uiEvent.shiftKey;
1182 
1183 	if (ev.action == DwtDropEvent.DRAG_ENTER) {
1184 		// Hack: in some instances ZmContact is reported as being an Array of
1185 		//       length 1 (as well as a ZmContact) under FF1.5
1186 		if (data instanceof Array && data.length > 1) {
1187 			var foundValid = false;
1188 			for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
1189 				if (!shiftKey && (data[i] instanceof ZmContact)) {
1190 					if (data[i].isGroup() && data[i].getGroupMembers().good.size() > 0) {
1191 						foundValid = true;
1192 					} else {
1193 						var email = data[i].getEmail();
1194 						if (email && email != "")
1195 							foundValid = true;
1196 					}
1197 				} else {
1198 					// theres other stuff besides contacts in here.. bail
1199 					ev.doIt = false;
1200 					return;
1201 				}
1202 			}
1203 
1204 			// if not a single valid email was found in list of contacts, bail
1205 			if (!foundValid) {
1206 				ev.doIt = false;
1207 				return;
1208 			}
1209 		} else {
1210 			if (!this._miniCalDropTarget.isValidTarget(data)) {
1211 				ev.doIt = false;
1212 				return;
1213 			}
1214 
1215 			// If dealing with a contact, make sure it has a valid email address
1216 			if (!shiftKey && data.isZmContact) {
1217 				if (data.isGroup() && !data.isDistributionList()) {
1218 					ev.doIt = (data.getGroupMembers().good.size() > 0);
1219 				} else {
1220 					var email = data.getEmail();
1221 					ev.doIt = (email != null && email != "");
1222 				}
1223 			}
1224 		}
1225 	} else if (ev.action == DwtDropEvent.DRAG_DROP) {
1226 		var dropDate = this._miniCalendar.getDndDate();
1227 
1228 		if (dropDate) {
1229 			// bug fix #5088 - reset time to next available slot
1230 			var now = new Date();
1231 			dropDate.setHours(now.getHours());
1232 			dropDate.setMinutes(now.getMinutes());
1233 			dropDate = AjxDateUtil.roundTimeMins(dropDate, 30);
1234 
1235 			if ((data instanceof ZmContact) ||
1236 				((data instanceof Array) && data[0] instanceof ZmContact))
1237 			{
1238 				this.newApptFromContact(data, dropDate);
1239 			}
1240 			else
1241 			{
1242 				if (shiftKey) {
1243 					AjxDispatcher.require(["TasksCore", "Tasks"]);
1244 					appCtxt.getApp(ZmApp.TASKS).newTaskFromMailItem(data, dropDate);
1245 				} else {
1246 					this.newApptFromMailItem(data, dropDate);
1247 				}
1248 			}
1249 		}
1250 	}
1251 };
1252 
1253 /**
1254  * This method will create a new appointment from a conversation/mail message. In the case
1255  * of a conversation, the appointment will be populated by the first message in the
1256  * conversation (or matched msg in the case of a search). This method is asynchronous and
1257  * will return immediately if the mail message must load in the background.
1258  *
1259  * @param {ZmConv|ZmMailMsg}	mailItem the may either be a conversation of message
1260  * @param {Date}	date 	the date/time for the appointment
1261  */
1262 ZmCalViewController.prototype.newApptFromMailItem =
1263 function(mailItem, date) {
1264 	var subject = mailItem.subject || "";
1265 	if (mailItem instanceof ZmConv) {
1266 		mailItem = mailItem.getFirstHotMsg();
1267 	}
1268 	mailItem.load({getHtml:false, markRead: true, forceLoad: true, noTruncate: true,
1269 	               callback:new AjxCallback(this, this._msgLoadedCallback, [mailItem, date, subject])});
1270 };
1271 
1272 ZmCalViewController.prototype._msgLoadedCallback =
1273 function(mailItem, date, subject) {
1274 	var newAppt = this._newApptObject(date, null, null, mailItem);
1275 	newAppt.setFromMailMessage(mailItem, subject);
1276 	
1277 	 if (appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.GROUP_CALENDAR_ENABLED)) {
1278         var addAttendeeDlg = this._attAttendeeDlg = appCtxt.getYesNoMsgDialog();
1279         addAttendeeDlg.reset();
1280         addAttendeeDlg.setMessage(ZmMsg.addRecipientstoAppt, DwtMessageDialog.WARNING_STYLE, ZmMsg.addAttendees);
1281         addAttendeeDlg.registerCallback(DwtDialog.YES_BUTTON, this._addAttendeeYesCallback, this, [newAppt]);
1282         addAttendeeDlg.registerCallback(DwtDialog.NO_BUTTON, this._addAttendeeNoCallback, this, [newAppt]);
1283         addAttendeeDlg.popup();
1284     }
1285     else {
1286         this.newAppointment(newAppt, ZmCalItem.MODE_NEW, true);
1287     }
1288 };
1289

1291 function(newAppt) {
1292     this._attAttendeeDlg.popdown();
1293     this.newAppointment(newAppt, ZmCalItem.MODE_NEW, true);
1294 };

1299     newAppt.setAttendees(null,ZmCalBaseItem.PERSON);
1300     this.newAppointment(newAppt, ZmCalItem.MODE_NEW, true);

1304 /**
1305  * This method will create a new appointment from a contact.
1306  *
1307  * @param {ZmContact}		contact the contact
1308  * @param {Date}	date 	the date/time for the appointment
1309  */
1310 ZmCalViewController.prototype.newApptFromContact =
1311 function(contact, date) {
1312 	var emails = [];
1313 	var list = AjxUtil.toArray(contact);
1314 	for (var i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
1315 		var item = list[i];
1316 		if (item.isGroup() && !item.isDistributionList()) {
1317 			var members = item.getGroupMembers().good.getArray();
1318 			for (var j = 0; j < members.length; j++) {
1319 				var e = members[j].address;
1320 				if (e && e !== "") {
1321 					emails.push(e);
1322 				}
1323 			}
1324 		}
1325 		else {
1326 			// grab the first valid email address for this contact
1327 			var e = item.getEmail();
1328 			if (e && e !== "") {
1329 				emails.push(e);
1330 			}
1331 		}
1332 	}
1333 
1334 	if (emails.length > 0) {
1335 		var newAppt = this._newApptObject(date);
1336 		newAppt.setAttendees(emails, ZmCalBaseItem.PERSON);
1337 		this.newAppointment(newAppt, ZmCalItem.MODE_NEW);
1338 	}
1339 };
1340 
1341 /**
1342  * This method will create a new appointment from an email address.
1343  *
1344  * @param {String}	emailAddr	the email address
1345  * @param {Date}	date 	the date/time for the appointment
1346  */
1347 ZmCalViewController.prototype.newApptFromEmailAddr =
1348 function(emailAddr, date) {
1349 	if (!emailAddr || emailAddr == "") {return; }
1350 
1351 	var newAppt = this._newApptObject(date);
1352 	newAppt.setAttendees(emailAddr, ZmCalBaseItem.PERSON);
1353 	this.newAppointment(newAppt, ZmCalItem.MODE_NEW);
1354 };

1370 ZmCalViewController.prototype._newApptAction =
1371 function(ev) {
1372 	var d = this._minicalMenu ? this._minicalMenu.__detail : null;
1373 
1374 	if (d != null) {
1375 		delete this._minicalMenu.__detail;
1376 	} else {
1377 		d = this._viewMgr ? this._viewMgr.getDate() : null;
1378 	}
1379 
1380 	// Bug 15686, eshum
1381 	// Uses the selected timeslot if possible.
1382 	var curr = this._viewVisible ? this._viewMgr.getDate() : new Date(); //new Date();
1383 	if (d == null) {
1384 		d = curr;
1385 	} else {
1386 		// bug fix #4693 - set the current time since it will be init'd to midnite
1387 		d.setHours(curr.getHours());
1388 		d.setMinutes(curr.getMinutes());
1389 	}
1390 	//bug:44423, Action Menu needs to select appropriate Calendar
1391 	var calendarId = null;
1392 	if (this._viewActionMenu && this._viewActionMenu._calendarId) {
1393 		calendarId = this._viewActionMenu._calendarId;
1394 		this._viewActionMenu._calendarId = null;
1395 	}
1396 
1397 	var loadCallback = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleLoadNewApptAction, [d, calendarId]);
1398 	AjxDispatcher.require(["MailCore", "CalendarCore", "Calendar"], false, loadCallback, null, true);
1399 };

1472 ZmCalViewController.prototype._paginate =

1483 /**
1484  * Sets the date.
1485  * 
1486  * @param	{Date}		date		the date
1487  * @param	{int}		duration	the duration
1488  * @param	{Boolean}	roll		if <code>true</code>, roll
1489  */
1490 ZmCalViewController.prototype.setDate =
1491 function(date, duration, roll) {
1492 	AjxDispatcher.require(["MailCore", "CalendarCore", "Calendar"]);
1493 	// set mini-cal first so it will cache appts we might need
1494 	if (this._miniCalendar.getDate() == null ||
1495 		this._miniCalendar.getDate().getTime() != date.getTime())
1496 	{
1497 		this._miniCalendar.setDate(date, true, roll);
1498 	}
1499 	if (this._viewMgr != null) {
1500 		this._viewMgr.setDate(date, duration, roll);
1501 		var viewId = this._viewMgr.getCurrentViewName();
1502 		var currentView = this._viewMgr.getCurrentView();
1503 		var title = currentView.getCalTitle();
1504 		Dwt.setTitle([ZmMsg.zimbraTitle, ": ", title].join(""));
1505 		if (!roll &&
1506 			this._currentViewType == ZmId.VIEW_CAL_WORK_WEEK &&
1507 			!currentView.workingHours[date.getDay()].isWorkingDay &&
1508 			(date.getDay() == 0 || date.getDay() == 6))
1509 		{
1510 			this.show(ZmId.VIEW_CAL_WEEK);
1511 		}
1512 		if (ZmId.VIEW_CAL_MONTH == this._currentViewType) {
1513 			title = this._viewMgr.getCurrentView().getShortCalTitle();
1514 		}
1515         if (ZmId.VIEW_CAL_FB == this._currentViewType && roll && appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.FREE_BUSY_VIEW_ENABLED)) {
1516             currentView._navDateChangeListener(date);
1517 		}
1518 		this._navToolBar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL].setText(title);
1519 	}
1520 };

1543 ZmCalViewController.prototype.newApptObject =
1544 function(startDate, duration, folderId, mailItem) {
1545 	return this._newApptObject(startDate, duration, folderId, mailItem);
1546 };
1547 
1548 ZmCalViewController.prototype._newApptObject =
1549 function(startDate, duration, folderId, mailItem) {
1550 	var newAppt = new ZmAppt();
1551 	newAppt.setStartDate(AjxDateUtil.roundTimeMins(startDate, 30));
1552 	newAppt.setEndDate(newAppt.getStartTime() + (duration ? duration : ZmCalViewController.DEFAULT_APPOINTMENT_DURATION));
1553 	newAppt.resetRepeatWeeklyDays();
1554 	newAppt.resetRepeatMonthlyDayList();
1555 	newAppt.resetRepeatYearlyMonthsList(startDate.getMonth()+1);
1556 	newAppt.resetRepeatCustomDayOfWeek();
1557     var defaultWarningTime = appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.CAL_REMINDER_WARNING_TIME);
1558 	if (defaultWarningTime) {
1559 		newAppt.setReminderMinutes(defaultWarningTime);
1560 	}
1561 
1562 	if (folderId) {
1563 		newAppt.setFolderId(folderId);
1564 	} else {
1565 		// get folderId from mail message if being created off of one
1566 		if (appCtxt.multiAccounts && mailItem) {
1567 			newAppt.setFolderId(mailItem.getAccount().getDefaultCalendar().id);
1568 		} else {
1569 			// bug: 27646 case where only one calendar is checked
1570 			var checkedFolderIds = this.getCheckedCalendarFolderIds();
1571 			if (checkedFolderIds && checkedFolderIds.length == 1) {
1572 				var calId = checkedFolderIds[0];
1573 				var cal = appCtxt.getById(calId);
1574 				// don't use calendar if feed, or remote and don't have write perms
1575 				if (cal) {
1576 					var share = cal.getMainShare();
1577 					var skipCal = (cal.isFeed() || (cal.link && share && !share.isWrite()));
1578 					if (cal && !skipCal) {
1579 						newAppt.setFolderId(calId);
1580 					}
1581 				}
1582 			} else if (appCtxt.multiAccounts) {
1583 				// calendar app has no notion of "active" app, so always set to default calendar
1584 				this.defaultAccount = appCtxt.isFamilyMbox ? this.mainAccount : this.visibleAccounts[1];
1585 				newAppt.setFolderId(calId);
1586 			}
1587 		}
1588 	}
1589 	newAppt.setPrivacy((appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.CAL_APPT_VISIBILITY) == ZmSetting.CAL_VISIBILITY_PRIV)?"PRI" :"PUB");
1590 	return newAppt;
1591 };

1595     if (!this._app.containsWritableFolder()) {
1596         return;
1597     }
1598 	var view = this._viewMgr.getCurrentView();
1599 	if (view.getSelectedItems().size() > 0) {
1600 		view.deselectAll();
1601 		this._resetOperations(this._toolbar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL_DAY], 0);
1602 	}
1603 	this.setDate(ev.detail, 0, ev.force);
1604 
1605 	// popup the edit dialog
1606 	if (ev._isDblClick){
1607 		this._apptFromView = view;
1608 		var appt = this._newApptObject(ev.detail);
1609 		appt.setAllDayEvent(ev.isAllDay);
1610 		if (ev.folderId) {
1611 			appt.setFolderId(ev.folderId);
1612 		}
1613 		this._showQuickAddDialog(appt, ev.shiftKey);
1614 	}

1692 		].join("");
1693 	} */
1694 
1695 	//window.open(appContextPath+url, "_blank");
1696 };

1698 ZmCalViewController.prototype.createPrintDialog =
1699 function() {
1700     var pd,
1701         params = {},
1702         curDate = this._viewMgr.getDate() || new Date();
1703

1710 ZmCalViewController.prototype._printListener =
1711 function(ev) {
1712     var ids = [];
1713     var list = this.getSelection();
1714     if (list.length == 0) {
1715         // Calendar list view is anomalous - on a right click (action menu) when resetOperations
1716         // is called, getSelection returns 1 item, but the selection actually only occurs if it was a
1717         // left click.  So we can get here with no selections.  Use the appt associated with the menu.
1718         var actionMenu = this.getActionMenu();
1719         var appt = actionMenu.__appt;
1720         if (appt) {
1721             ids.push(appt.invId);
1722         }
1723         // bug:68735 if no selection is made in the calendar, open up the print dialog
1724         else{
1725             this._printCalendarListener(ev);
1726         }
1727 
1728     }
1729     else {
1730         for (var i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
1731             ids.push(list[i].invId);
1732         }
1733     }
1734     if (ids.length == 0) return;
1735 
1736     var url = ["/h/printappointments?id=", ids.join(','), "&tz=", AjxTimezone.getServerId(AjxTimezone.DEFAULT)];
1737     if(appCtxt.isOffline) {
1738         if (ids.length == 1) {
1739             var appt = this.getSelection()[0];
1740             url.push("&acct=", appt.getFolder().getAccount().name);
1741         }
1742         url.push("&zd=", "true");
1743     }
1744     url = url.join("");
1745 
1746     window.open(appContextPath+url, "_blank");
1747 };

1791 ZmCalViewController.prototype.duplicateAppt =
1792 function(appt, params) {
1793 	Dwt.setLoadingTime("ZmCalendarApp-cloneAppt");
1794 	var clone = ZmAppt.quickClone(appt);
1795 	var mode = ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT;
1796 	if (appt.isRecurring()) {
1797 		mode = params.isException ? ZmCalItem.MODE_COPY_SINGLE_INSTANCE : ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SERIES;  //at first I also created a MODE_COPY_SERIES but I'm afraid of the impact and regressions. So keep it as "edit".
1798 	}
1799 	clone.getDetails(mode, new AjxCallback(this, this._duplicateApptContinue, [clone, ZmCalItem.MODE_NEW, params]));
1800 	Dwt.setLoadedTime("ZmCalendarApp-cloneAppt");
1801 };
1802 
1803 ZmCalViewController.prototype._duplicateApptContinue =
1804 function(appt, mode, params) {
1805 	if(params.isException) appt.clearRecurrence();
1806 	if(params.startDate) appt.setStartDate(params.startDate);
1807 	if(params.endDate) appt.setEndDate(params.endDate);
1808 
1809     if (!appt.isOrganizer() || appt.isReadOnly()) {  //isOrganizer means current user is the organizer of the appt. (which is not the case if the appt is on a shared folder, even if the current user has admin or manager rights (i.e. not read only)
1810           var origOrganizer=appt.organizer;
1811           var myEmail=appt.getFolder().getAccount().getEmail();
1812           appt.replaceAttendee(myEmail,origOrganizer);
1813           appt.organizer=myEmail;
1814           appt.isOrg=true;
1815           if(appt.isShared()) {
1816             appt.isSharedCopy = true;
1817 			if (!appt.getFolderId()) { //not sure why the following line is done, but if the appt is of a certain folder, it should be kept that folder in the copy.
1818             	appt.setFolderId(ZmOrganizer.ID_CALENDAR);
1819 			}
1820           }
1821           var dlg = appCtxt.getMsgDialog();
1822 		  var callback = new AjxCallback(this, this.newAppointment,[appt,mode,true]);
1823 		  var listener = new AjxListener(this, this._handleReadonlyOk, [callback, dlg]);
1824 		  dlg.setButtonListener(DwtDialog.OK_BUTTON, listener);
1825 		  dlg.setMessage(ZmMsg.confirmApptDuplication);
1826 		  dlg.popup();
1827     }
1828     else {
1829 		appt.organizer = null; // Let the organizer be set according to the choise in the form. (the calendar).
1830 	    this.newAppointment(appt, mode, true);
1831     }
1832 };

1834 ZmCalViewController.prototype._proposeTimeListener =
1835 function(ev) {
1836 	var op = ev.item.parent.getData(ZmOperation.KEY_ID);
1837 
1838 	var items = this.getSelection();
1839 
1840 	// listview cannot handle proposing time for multiple items at once
1841 	if (this._viewMgr.getCurrentViewName() == ZmId.VIEW_CAL_LIST && items.length > 1) {
1842 		return;
1843 	}
1844 
1845 	var mode = ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT;
1846 	if (op == ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_INSTANCE || op == ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_SERIES) {
1847 		mode = (op == ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_INSTANCE)
1848 			? ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SINGLE_INSTANCE
1849 			: ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SERIES;
1850 	}
1851 
1852 	var appt = items[0];
1853 	var clone = ZmAppt.quickClone(appt);
1854 	clone.setProposeTimeMode(true);
1855 	clone.getDetails(mode, new AjxCallback(this, this._proposeTimeContinue, [clone, mode]));
1856 };
1857 
1858 ZmCalViewController.prototype._proposeTimeContinue =
1859 function(appt, mode) {
1860 	appt.setViewMode(mode);
1861 	AjxDispatcher.run("GetApptComposeController").proposeNewTime(appt);
1862 };

1864 ZmCalViewController.prototype._reinviteAttendeesListener =
1865 function(ev) {
1866     var items = this.getSelection();
1867     // listview cannot handle reinvite for multiple items at once
1868     if (this._viewMgr.getCurrentViewName() == ZmId.VIEW_CAL_LIST && items.length > 1) {
1869         return;
1870     }
1871     // Get the details.  Otherwise, on send, any missing information will be deleted server side
1872     var detailsSuccessCallback = this._sendAppt.bind(this, items[0]);
1873     items[0].getDetails(null, detailsSuccessCallback, this._errorCallback);
1874 };

1876 ZmCalViewController.prototype._sendAppt =
1877 function(appt) {
1878     var mode = appt.viewMode;
1879     appt.viewMode =  ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT;
1880 
1881     var callback = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleResponseSave, appt);
1882     var errorCallback = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleErrorSave, appt);
1883     appt.send(null, callback, errorCallback);
1884 
1885     appt.viewMode = mode;
1886 };
1887 
1888 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleResponseSave =
1889 function(response) {
1890     appCtxt.setStatusMsg(ZmMsg.apptSent);
1891 };
1892 
1893 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleErrorSave =
1894 function(calItem, ex) {
1895     var status = calItem.processErrorSave(ex);
1896     var handled = false;
1897 
1898     if (status.continueSave) {
1899         this._sendAppt(calItem);
1900         handled = true;
1901     } else {
1902         if (status.errorMessage) {
1903             // Handled the error, display the error message
1904             handled = true;
1905             var dialog = appCtxt.getMsgDialog();
1906             dialog.setMessage(status.errorMessage, DwtMessageDialog.CRITICAL_STYLE);
1907             dialog.popup();
1908         }
1909         appCtxt.notifyZimlets("onSaveApptFailure", [this, calItem, ex]);
1910     }
1911     return handled;
1912 };

1914 ZmCalViewController.prototype._doForward =
1915 function(items, op) {
1916 	// listview cannot handle forwarding multiple items at once
1917 	if (this._viewMgr.getCurrentViewName() == ZmId.VIEW_CAL_LIST && items.length > 1) {
1918 		return;
1919 	}
1920 
1921 	// since base view has multiple selection turned off, always select first item
1922 	var appt = items[0];
1923 	var mode = ZmCalItem.MODE_FORWARD;
1924 	if (op == ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_INSTANCE || op == ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_SERIES) {
1925 		mode = (op == ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_INSTANCE)
1926 			? ZmCalItem.MODE_FORWARD_SINGLE_INSTANCE
1927 			: ZmCalItem.MODE_FORWARD_SERIES;
1928 	}
1929 	this._forwardAppointment(appt, mode);
1930 };

1932 /**
1933  * Override the ZmListController method.
1934  * 
1935  * @private
1936  */
1937 ZmCalViewController.prototype._doDelete =
1938 function(items, hardDelete, attrs, op) {
1939 
1940     var isTrash = false;
1941 
1942 	// listview can handle deleting multiple items at once
1943     if(items.length>0){
1944         var calendar = items[0].getFolder();
1945         isTrash = calendar && calendar.nId==ZmOrganizer.ID_TRASH;
1946     }
1947 
1948 	if ((this._viewMgr.getCurrentViewName() == ZmId.VIEW_CAL_LIST || isTrash) && items.length > 1) {
1949 		var divvied = this._divvyItems(items);
1950 
1951 		// first attempt to deal with read-only appointments
1952 		if (divvied.readonly.length > 0) {
1953 			var dlg = appCtxt.getMsgDialog();
1954 			var callback = (divvied.recurring.length > 0)
1955 				? this._showTypeDialog.bind(this, [divvied.recurring, ZmCalItem.MODE_DELETE])
1956 				: null;
1957 			var listener = new AjxListener(this, this._handleReadonlyOk, [callback, dlg]);
1958 			dlg.setButtonListener(DwtDialog.OK_BUTTON, listener);
1959 			dlg.setMessage(ZmMsg.deleteReadonly);
1960 			dlg.popup();
1961 		}
1962 		else if (divvied.recurring.length > 0) {
1963 			this._showTypeDialog(divvied.recurring, ZmCalItem.MODE_DELETE);
1964 		}
1965 		else {
1966 			this._promptDeleteApptList(divvied.normal);
1967 		}
1968 	}
1969 	else {
1970 		// since base view has multiple selection turned off, always select first item
1971 		var appt = items[0];
1972 		if (op == ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_INSTANCE || op == ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_SERIES) {
1973 			var mode = (op == ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_INSTANCE)
1974 				? ZmCalItem.MODE_DELETE_INSTANCE
1975 				: ZmCalItem.MODE_DELETE_SERIES;
1976 			this._promptDeleteAppt(appt, mode);
1977 		} else {
1978 			this._deleteAppointment(appt);
1979 		}
1980 	}
1981 };
1982 
1983 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleReadonlyOk =
1984 function(callback, dlg) {
1985 	dlg.popdown();
1986 	if (callback) {
1987 		callback.run();
1988 	}
1989 };

1991 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleMultiDelete =
1992 function(deleteList, mode) {
1993 	var batchCmd = new ZmBatchCommand(true, null, true);
1994 
1995 	// first, get details for each appointment
1996 	for (var i = 0; i < deleteList.length; i++) {
1997 		var appt = deleteList[i];
1998 		var args = [mode, null, null, null, null];
1999 		batchCmd.add(new AjxCallback(appt, appt.getDetails, args));
2000 	}
2001 	batchCmd.run(this._handleGetDetails.bind(this, deleteList, mode));
2002 };
2003 
2004 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleGetDetails =
2005 function(deleteList, mode) {
2006 	var batchCmd = new ZmBatchCommand(true, null, true);
2007 	for (var i = 0; i < deleteList.length; i++) {
2008 		var appt = deleteList[i];
2009 		var args = [mode, null, null, null];
2010 		batchCmd.add(new AjxCallback(appt, appt.cancel, args));
2011 	}
2012 	batchCmd.run();
2013 	var summary = ZmList.getActionSummary({
2014 		actionTextKey:  'actionDelete',
2015 		numItems:       batchCmd.size(),
2016 		type:           ZmItem.APPT
2017 	});
2018 	appCtxt.setStatusMsg(summary);
2019 	appCtxt.notifyZimlets("onAppointmentDelete", deleteList);//notify Zimlets on delete
2020 };

2031 ZmCalViewController.prototype._divvyItems =
2032 function(items) {
2033 
2034 	var normal = [];
2035 	var readonly = [];
2036 	var recurring = [];
2037 	var shared = [];
2038 
2039 	for (var i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
2040 		var appt = items[i];
2041 		if (appt.type != ZmItem.APPT) { continue; }
2042 
2043 		if (appt.isFolderReadOnly()) {
2044 			readonly.push(appt);
2045 		}
2046 		else if (appt.isRecurring() && !appt.isException) {
2047 			recurring.push(appt);
2048 		}
2049 		else {
2050 			normal.push(appt);
2051 		}
2052 
2053 		// keep a separate list of shared items. This means "recurring" and
2054 		// "normal" can contain shared items as well.
2055 		var calendar = appt.getFolder();
2056 		if (calendar && calendar.isRemote()) {
2057 			shared.push(appt);
2058 		}
2059 	}
2060 
2061 	return {normal:normal, readonly:readonly, recurring:recurring, shared:shared};
2062 };

2064 ZmCalViewController.prototype._promptDeleteApptList =
2065 function(deleteList) {
2066 	if (deleteList.length === 0) {
2067 		return;
2068 	}
2069 	var calendar = deleteList[0].getFolder();
2070 	var isTrash = calendar && calendar.nId == ZmOrganizer.ID_TRASH;
2071 	var msg = (isTrash) ? ZmMsg.confirmCancelApptListPermanently : ZmMsg.confirmCancelApptList;
2072 	var callback = this._handleMultiDelete.bind(this, deleteList, ZmCalItem.MODE_DELETE);
2073 	appCtxt.getConfirmationDialog().popup(msg, callback);
2074 };

2076 ZmCalViewController.prototype._promptDeleteAppt =
2077 function(appt, mode) {
2078     if(!appt){
2079         return;
2080     }
2081 	if (appt instanceof Array) {
2082 		this._continueDelete(appt, mode);
2083 	} else {
2084 		if (appt.isOrganizer()) {
2085 			if (mode == ZmCalItem.MODE_DELETE_SERIES) {
2086 				this._promptDeleteFutureInstances(appt, mode);
2087 			} else {
2088 				this._promptCancelReply(appt, mode);
2089 			}
2090 		} else {
2091 			this._promptDeleteNotify(appt, mode);
2092 		}
2093 	}
2094 };

2101         var extraButtons = [editMessageButton];
2102         ZmCalViewController._confirmDialog = new DwtConfirmDialog(this._shell, null, "CNF_DEL_SENDEDIT", buttons, extraButtons);
2103         var noButton = ZmCalViewController._confirmDialog.getButton(DwtDialog.NO_BUTTON);

2109 ZmCalViewController.prototype._promptCancelReply =
2110 function(appt, mode) {
2111 	var cancelNoReplyCallback = new AjxCallback(this, this._continueDelete, [appt, mode]);
2112     var confirmDialog;
2113     var calendar = appt && appt.getFolder();
2114     var isTrash = calendar && calendar.nId==ZmOrganizer.ID_TRASH;
2115 
2116     // Display traditional Yes/No Dialog if
2117     // - If appt has no attendees
2118     // - appt is from trash
2119     // - appt is saved but not sent
2120 	if (!isTrash && appt.otherAttendees && !appt.inviteNeverSent && appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.MAIL_ENABLED)) {
2121         confirmDialog = this._confirmDeleteApptDialog();
2122         var cancelReplyCallback = new AjxCallback(this, this._continueDeleteReply, [appt, mode]);
2123 
2124         confirmDialog.setTitle(ZmMsg.confirmDeleteApptTitle);
2125 		confirmDialog.popup(ZmMsg.confirmCancelApptReply, cancelReplyCallback, cancelNoReplyCallback);
2126 	} else {
2127         confirmDialog = appCtxt.getConfirmationDialog("CNF_DEL_YESNO");
2128 		var msg = isTrash ? ZmMsg.confirmPermanentCancelAppt : ZmMsg.confirmCancelAppt;
2129 
2130 		if (appt.isRecurring() && !appt.isException && !isTrash) {
2131 	    	msg = (mode == ZmCalItem.MODE_DELETE_INSTANCE) ? AjxMessageFormat.format(ZmMsg.confirmCancelApptInst, AjxStringUtil.htmlEncode(appt.name)) :  ZmMsg.confirmCancelApptSeries; 
2132 		}
2133         confirmDialog.setTitle(ZmMsg.confirmDeleteApptTitle);
2134 		confirmDialog.popup(msg, cancelNoReplyCallback);
2135 	}

2228 ZmCalViewController.prototype._cancelBeforeDeleteContinue =
2229 function(appt, type, mode) {
2230 	var msgController = this._getMsgController();
2231 	msgController.setMsg(appt.message);
2232 	// poke the msgController
2233 	var instanceDate = mode == ZmCalItem.MODE_DELETE_INSTANCE ? new Date(appt.uniqStartTime) : null;
2234     var delContCallback = new AjxCallback(this, this._continueDelete, [appt, mode]);
2235 	msgController._sendInviteReply(type, appt.compNum || 0, instanceDate, appt.getRemoteFolderOwner(),false,null,null,delContCallback);
2236 };

2240 function(appt) {
2241 	if (!appt) { return; }

2250 	}

2272 ZmCalViewController.prototype._continueDelete =
2273 function(appt, mode) {
2274 	if (appt instanceof Array) {
2275 		// if list of appointments, de-dupe the same series appointments
2276 		var deleteList = (mode === ZmCalItem.MODE_DELETE_SERIES) ? this._dedupeSeries(appt) : appt;
2277 		this._handleMultiDelete(deleteList, mode);
2278 	}
2279 	else {
2280 		var respCallback = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleResponseContinueDelete, appt);
2281 		appt.cancel(mode, null, respCallback, this._errorCallback);
2282 	}
2283 };

2286 function(appt) {
2287 
2288     var currentView = appCtxt.getCurrentView();
2289     if (currentView && currentView.isZmApptView) {
2290         currentView.close();
2291     }
2292 
2293 	var summary = ZmList.getActionSummary({
2294 		actionTextKey:  'actionDelete',
2295 		numItems:       1,
2296 		type:           ZmItem.APPT
2297 	});
2298 	appCtxt.setStatusMsg(summary);
2299 	appCtxt.notifyZimlets("onAppointmentDelete", [appt]);//notify Zimlets on delete 
2300 };

2302 /**
2303  * This method takes a list of recurring appointments and returns a list of
2304  * unique appointments (removes instances)
2305  *
2306  * @param list		[Array]		List of *recurring* appointments
2307  * 
2308  * @private
2309  */
2310 ZmCalViewController.prototype._dedupeSeries =
2311 function(list) {
2312 	var unique = [];
2313 	var deduped = {};
2314 	for (var i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
2315 		var appt = list[i];
2316 		if (!deduped[appt.id]) {
2317 			deduped[appt.id] = true;
2318 			unique.push(appt);
2319 		}
2320 	}
2321 	return unique;
2322 };
2323 
2324 ZmCalViewController.prototype._getMoveParams =
2325 function(dlg) {
2326 	var params = ZmListController.prototype._getMoveParams.apply(this, arguments);
2327 	var omit = {};
2328 	var folderTree = appCtxt.getFolderTree();
2329 	if (!folderTree) { return params; }
2330 
2331 	var folders = folderTree.getByType(ZmOrganizer.CALENDAR);
2332 	for (var i = 0; i < folders.length; i++) {
2333 		var folder = folders[i];
2334 		if (folder.link && folder.isReadOnly()) {
2335 			omit[folder.id] = true;
2336 		}
2337 	}
2338 	params.omit = omit;
2339 	params.description = ZmMsg.targetCalendar;
2340 
2341 	return params;
2342 };

2383 ZmCalViewController.prototype._showQuickAddDialog =
2384 function(appt, shiftKey) {
2385     if(appCtxt.isExternalAccount() || appCtxt.isWebClientOffline()) { return; }
2386 	// find out if we really should display the quick add dialog
2387 	var useQuickAdd = appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.CAL_USE_QUICK_ADD);
2388 	if ((useQuickAdd && !shiftKey) || (!useQuickAdd && shiftKey)) {
2389 		if (AjxTimezone.TIMEZONE_CONFLICT || AjxTimezone.DEFAULT_RULE.autoDetected) {
2390 			var timezonePicker = this.getTimezonePicker();
2391 			var callback = new AjxCallback(this, this.handleTimezoneSelectionQuickAdd, [appt, shiftKey]);
2392 			timezonePicker.setCallback(callback);
2393 			timezonePicker.popup();
2394 		} else {
2395 			this._showQuickAddDialogContinue(appt, shiftKey);
2396 		}
2397 	} else {
2398 		this.newAppointment(appt);
2399 	}
2400 };

2431 ZmCalViewController.prototype.newAppointment =
2432 function(newAppt, mode, isDirty, startDate) {
2433 	AjxDispatcher.require(["MailCore", "CalendarCore", "Calendar"]);
2434 	var sd = startDate || (this._viewVisible ? this._viewMgr.getDate() : new Date());
2435 	var appt = newAppt || this._newApptObject(sd, (appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.CAL_DEFAULT_APPT_DURATION) * 1000));  //bug:50121 added appt duration as configurable from preference
2436 
2437     //certain views can set attendees before creating appointment
2438     if(this._viewVisible && this._viewMgr.getCurrentView().getAtttendees) {
2439         var attendees = this._viewMgr.getCurrentView().getAtttendees();
2440         if(attendees && attendees.length > 0) appt.setAttendees(attendees, ZmCalBaseItem.PERSON);
2441     }
2442 
2443     if (AjxTimezone.TIMEZONE_CONFLICT || AjxTimezone.DEFAULT_RULE.autoDetected) {
2444 		var timezonePicker = this.getTimezonePicker();
2445 		var callback = new AjxCallback(this, this.handleTimezoneSelection, [appt, mode, isDirty]);
2446 		timezonePicker.setCallback(callback);
2447 		timezonePicker.popup();
2448 	} else {
2449 		this._app.getApptComposeController().show(appt, mode, isDirty);
2450 	}
2451 };

2465 ZmCalViewController.prototype.updateTimezoneInfo =
2466 function(appt, serverId) {
2467 	appt.setTimezone(serverId);
2468 	appCtxt.set(ZmSetting.DEFAULT_TIMEZONE, serverId);
2469 	AjxTimezone.TIMEZONE_CONFLICT = false;
2470 	this.updateDefaultTimezone(serverId);
2471 	var settings = appCtxt.getSettings();
2472 	var tzSetting = settings.getSetting(ZmSetting.DEFAULT_TIMEZONE);
2473 	settings.save([tzSetting], new AjxCallback(this, this._timezoneSaveCallback));
2474 };
2475 
2476 ZmCalViewController.prototype.updateDefaultTimezone =
2477 function(serverId) {
2478 	for (var i =0; i < AjxTimezone.MATCHING_RULES.length; i++) {
2479 		if (AjxTimezone.MATCHING_RULES[i].serverId == serverId) {
2480 			AjxTimezone.DEFAULT_RULE = AjxTimezone.MATCHING_RULES[i];
2481 			AjxTimezone.DEFAULT = AjxTimezone.getClientId(AjxTimezone.DEFAULT_RULE.serverId);
2482 			break;
2483 		}
2484 	}
2485 };

2523     var clone = ZmAppt.quickClone(appt);
2524 	var respCallback = new AjxCallback(this, this._replyDetailsHandler, [clone, all]);

2529 ZmCalViewController.prototype._replyDetailsHandler =
2530 function(appt, all, result) {
2531 
2532 	var msg = new ZmMailMsg(-1, null, true);
2533 	var orig = appt.message;
2534 	if (orig) {
2535 		var inviteHtml = orig.getInviteDescriptionContent(ZmMimeTable.TEXT_HTML);
2536         if (inviteHtml) {
2537             var htmlContent = inviteHtml.getContent();
2538             htmlContent && msg.setInviteDescriptionContent(ZmMimeTable.TEXT_HTML, htmlContent);
2539         }
2540 
2541 		var inviteText = orig.getInviteDescriptionContent(ZmMimeTable.TEXT_PLAIN);
2542         if (inviteText) {
2543             var textContent = inviteText.getContent();
2544             textContent && msg.setInviteDescriptionContent(ZmMimeTable.TEXT_PLAIN, textContent);
2545         }
2546         if (htmlContent || textContent) {
2547             msg._loaded = true;
2548         }
2549 
2550 		msg.invite = orig.invite;
2551 		msg.id = orig.id;
2552         msg.date = orig.date;
2553 	}
2554 	msg.setSubject(appt.name);
2555 
2556 	var organizer = appt.getOrganizer();
2557 	var organizerAddress = AjxEmailAddress.parse(organizer);
2558 	var self = appCtxt.getActiveAccount().name;
2559 	msg.getHeaderStr = AjxCallback.returnFalse; // Real ugly hack to prevent headers from showing in the message
2560 
2561     var isOrganizer = appt.isOrganizer();
2562     var folder = appt.getFolder();
2563     var isRemote = folder ? folder.isRemote() : false;
2564 	if (!isOrganizer || isRemote) {
2565 		organizerAddress.setType(AjxEmailAddress.FROM);
2566 		msg.addAddress(organizerAddress);
2567 	}
2568 
2569 	if (all) {
2570 		var omit = AjxUtil.arrayAsHash([ self, organizerAddress.getAddress() ]),
2571 			attendees = appt.getAttendees(ZmCalBaseItem.PERSON);
2572 
2573 		this._addAttendeesToReply(attendees, msg, ZmCalItem.ROLE_REQUIRED, AjxEmailAddress.FROM, omit);
2574 		this._addAttendeesToReply(attendees, msg, ZmCalItem.ROLE_OPTIONAL, AjxEmailAddress.CC, omit);
2575 	}
2576 	
2577 	var data = {action: all ? ZmOperation.CAL_REPLY_ALL : ZmOperation.CAL_REPLY, msg: msg};
2578 	AjxDispatcher.run("GetComposeController").doAction(data);
2579 };
2580 
2581 ZmCalViewController.prototype._addAttendeesToReply = function(attendees, msg, role, addrType, omit) {
2582 
2583 	var attendeesByRole = ZmApptViewHelper.getAttendeesArrayByRole(attendees, role),
2584 		ln = attendeesByRole.length, i, addr;
2585 
2586 	for (i = 0; i < ln; i++) {
2587 		addr = attendeesByRole[i].getAttendeeText(ZmCalBaseItem.PERSON);
2588 		if (addr && !omit[addr]) {
2589 			var addrObj = new AjxEmailAddress(addr);
2590 			addrObj.setType(addrType);
2591 			msg.addAddress(addrObj);
2592 		}
2593 	}
2594 };

2609 ZmCalViewController.prototype._showAppointmentDetails =
2610 function(appt) {
2611 	// if we have an appointment, go get all the details.
2612 	if (!appt.__creating) {
2613 		var calendar = appt.getFolder();
2614 		var isSynced = Boolean(calendar.url);
2615 		if (appt.isRecurring()) {
2616 			// prompt user to edit instance vs. series if recurring but not for exception and from edit mode
2617 			if (appt.isException || appt.editViewMode) {
2618 				var mode = appt.editViewMode || ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SINGLE_INSTANCE;
2619 				if (appt.isReadOnly() || calendar.isReadOnly() || isSynced || appCtxt.isWebClientOffline()) {
2620 					this.showApptReadOnlyView(appt, mode);
2621 				} else {
2622 					this.editAppointment(appt, mode);
2623 				}
2624 			} else {
2625 				this._showTypeDialog(appt, ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT);
2626 			}
2627 		} else {
2628 			// if simple appointment, no prompting necessary
2629             var isTrash = calendar.nId == ZmOrganizer.ID_TRASH;
2630 			if (appt.isReadOnly() || calendar.isReadOnly() || isSynced || isTrash || appCtxt.isWebClientOffline()) {
2631                 var mode = appt.isRecurring() ? (appt.isException ? ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SINGLE_INSTANCE : ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SERIES) : ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT;
2632 				this.showApptReadOnlyView(appt, mode);
2633 			} else {
2634 				this.editAppointment(appt, ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT);
2635 			}
2636 		}
2637 	} else {
2638 		this.newAppointment(appt);
2639 	}
2640 };
