2642 ZmCalViewController.prototype._typeOkListener =
2643 function(ev) {
2644 	if (this._typeDialog.mode == ZmCalItem.MODE_DELETE)
2645 		this._promptDeleteAppt(this._typeDialog.calItem, this._typeDialog.isInstance() ? ZmCalItem.MODE_DELETE_INSTANCE : ZmCalItem.MODE_DELETE_SERIES);
2646 	else
2647 		this._performApptAction(this._typeDialog.calItem, this._typeDialog.mode, this._typeDialog.isInstance());
2648 };
2649 
2650 ZmCalViewController.prototype._performApptAction =
2651 function(appt, mode, isInstance) {
2652 	if (mode == ZmCalItem.MODE_DELETE) {
2653 		var delMode = isInstance ? ZmCalItem.MODE_DELETE_INSTANCE : ZmCalItem.MODE_DELETE_SERIES;
2654 		if (appt instanceof Array) {
2655 			this._continueDelete(appt, delMode);
2656 		} else {
2657 			if (appt.isOrganizer()) {
2658 				this._continueDelete(appt, delMode);
2659 			} else {
2660 				this._promptDeleteNotify(appt, delMode);
2661 			}
2662 		}
2663 	}
2664 	else if (mode == ZmAppt.MODE_DRAG_OR_SASH) {
2665 		var viewMode = isInstance ? ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SINGLE_INSTANCE : ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SERIES;
2666 		var state = this._updateApptDateState;
2667 		var args = [state.appt, viewMode, state.startDateOffset, state.endDateOffset, state.callback, state.errorCallback];
2668 		var respCallback = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleResponseUpdateApptDate, args);
2669 		delete this._updateApptDateState;
2670 		appt.getDetails(viewMode, respCallback, state.errorCallback);
2671 	}
2672 	else {
2673 		var editMode = isInstance ? ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SINGLE_INSTANCE : ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SERIES;
2674 		var calendar = appt.getFolder();
2675 		var isSynced = Boolean(calendar.url);
2676 
2677 		if (appt.isReadOnly() || calendar.isReadOnly() || isSynced || appCtxt.isWebClientOffline()) {
2678 			this.showApptReadOnlyView(appt, editMode);
2679 		} else {
2680 			this.editAppointment(appt, editMode);
2681 		}
2682 	}
2683 };
2684 
2685 ZmCalViewController.prototype._typeCancelListener =
2686 function(ev) {
2687 	if (this._typeDialog.mode == ZmAppt.MODE_DRAG_OR_SASH) {
2688 		// we cancel the drag/sash, refresh view
2689 		this._refreshAction(true);
2690 	}
2691 };
2692 
2693 ZmCalViewController.prototype._quickAddOkListener =
2694 function(ev) {
2695     var isValid = this._quickAddDialog.isValid();
2696     var appt = this._quickAddDialog.getAppt();
2697     var closeCallback = this._quickAddCallback.bind(this, true);
2698     var errorCallback = this._quickAddCallback.bind(this, false);
2699 
2700     var locations = appt.getAttendees(ZmCalBaseItem.LOCATION);
2701     // Send if any locations attendees are specified.  This will send invites
2702     var action = (locations.length == 0) ? ZmCalItemComposeController.SAVE_CLOSE :
2703                                            ZmCalItemComposeController.SEND;
2704     this._saveSimpleAppt(isValid, appt, action, closeCallback, errorCallback);
2705 }
2706 
2707 ZmCalViewController.prototype._saveSimpleAppt =
2708 function(isValid, appt, action, closeCallback, errorCallback, cancelCallback) {
2709 	try {
2710 		if (isValid && appt) {
2711             if (appt.getFolder() && appt.getFolder().noSuchFolder) {
2712                 throw AjxMessageFormat.format(ZmMsg.errorInvalidFolder, appt.getFolder().name);
2713             }
2714             if (!this._simpleComposeController) {
2715                 // Create a compose controller, used for saving the quick add
2716                 // appt and modifications made via ZmCalColView drag and drop, in
2717                 // order to trigger permission and resource checks.
2718                 this._simpleComposeController = this._app.getSimpleApptComposeController();
2719             }
2720             this._simpleComposeController.doSimpleSave(appt, action, closeCallback,
2721                                                        errorCallback, cancelCallback);
2722         }
2723 	} catch(ex) {
2724 		if (typeof ex == "string") {
2725 			var errorDialog = new DwtMessageDialog({parent:this._shell});
2726 			var msg = ex ? AjxMessageFormat.format(ZmMsg.errorSavingWithMessage, ex) : ZmMsg.errorSaving;
2727 			errorDialog.setMessage(msg, DwtMessageDialog.CRITICAL_STYLE);
2728 			errorDialog.popup();
2729 		}else{
2730             ZmController.handleScriptError(ex);
2731         }
2732 	}
2733 };
2734 
2735 ZmCalViewController.prototype._quickAddCallback =
2736 function(success) {
2737     if (success) {
2738         this._quickAddDialog.popdown();
2739     }
2740     appCtxt.setStatusMsg(success ? ZmMsg.apptCreated : ZmMsg.apptCreationError);
2741 };

2748 		this.newAppointment(appt, ZmCalItem.MODE_NEW_FROM_QUICKADD, this._quickAddDialog.isDirty());

2765 /**
2766  * appt - appt to change
2767  * startDate - new date or null to leave alone
2768  * endDate - new or null to leave alone
2769  * changeSeries - if recurring, change the whole series
2770  *
2771  * TODO: change this to work with _handleException, and take callback so view can
2772  *       restore appt location/size on failure
2773  *       
2774  * @private
2775  */
2776 ZmCalViewController.prototype.dndUpdateApptDate =
2777 function(appt, startDateOffset, endDateOffset, callback, errorCallback, ev) {	
2778 	appt.dndUpdate = true;
2779 	if (!appt.isRecurring()) {
2780 		var viewMode = ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT;
2781 		var respCallback = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleResponseUpdateApptDate, [appt, viewMode, startDateOffset, endDateOffset, callback, errorCallback]);
2782 		appt.getDetails(viewMode, respCallback, errorCallback);
2783 	}
2784 	else {
2785 		if (ev.shiftKey || ev.altKey) {
2786 			var viewMode = ev.altKey ? ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SERIES : ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SINGLE_INSTANCE;
2787 			var respCallback = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleResponseUpdateApptDate, [appt, viewMode, startDateOffset, endDateOffset, callback, errorCallback]);
2788 			appt.getDetails(viewMode, respCallback, errorCallback);
2789 		}
2790 		else {
2791 			this._updateApptDateState = {appt:appt, startDateOffset: startDateOffset, endDateOffset: endDateOffset, callback: callback, errorCallback: errorCallback };
2792 			if (appt.isException) {
2793 				this._performApptAction(appt, ZmAppt.MODE_DRAG_OR_SASH, true);
2794 			} else {
2795 				this._showTypeDialog(appt, ZmAppt.MODE_DRAG_OR_SASH);
2796 			}
2797 		}
2798 	}
2799 	appCtxt.notifyZimlets("onApptDrop", [appt, startDateOffset, endDateOffset]);		
2800 };

2802 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleResponseUpdateApptDate =
2803 function(appt, viewMode, startDateOffset, endDateOffset, callback, errorCallback, result) {
2804 	// skip prompt if no attendees
2805 	if (appt.inviteNeverSent || !appt.otherAttendees) {
2806 		this._handleResponseUpdateApptDateSave.apply(this, arguments);
2807 		return;
2808 	}
2809 
2810 	// NOTE: We copy the arguments into an array because arguments
2811 	//       is *not* technically an array. So if anyone along the
2812 	//       line considers it such it will blow up -- this prevents
2813 	//       that at the expense of having to keep this array and
2814 	//       the actual argument list in sync.
2815 	var args = [appt, viewMode, startDateOffset, endDateOffset, callback, errorCallback, result];
2816 	var edit = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleResponseUpdateApptDateEdit, args);
2817 	var save = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleResponseUpdateApptDateSave, args);
2818 	var ignore = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleResponseUpdateApptDateIgnore, args);
2819 
2820 	var dialog = appCtxt.getConfirmationDialog();
2821 	dialog.popup(ZmMsg.confirmModifyApptReply, edit, save, ignore);
2822 };

2827     clone.editViewMode = viewMode;
2828 	if (startDateOffset) clone.setStartDate(new Date(clone.getStartTime() + startDateOffset));
2829 	if (endDateOffset) clone.setEndDate(new Date(clone.getEndTime() + endDateOffset));
2830 	this._showAppointmentDetails(clone);
2831 };

2839 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleResponseUpdateApptDateSave =
2840 function(appt, viewMode, startDateOffset, endDateOffset, callback, errorCallback, result) {
2841          var isExceptionAllowed = appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.CAL_EXCEPTION_ON_SERIES_TIME_CHANGE);
2842          var showWarning = appt.isRecurring() && appt.hasEx && appt.getAttendees(ZmCalBaseItem.PERSON) && !isExceptionAllowed && viewMode==ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SERIES;
2843          if(showWarning){
2844             var respCallback = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleResponseUpdateApptDateSaveContinue, [appt, viewMode, startDateOffset, endDateOffset, callback, errorCallback, result]);
2845             this._showExceptionWarning(respCallback);
2846          }
2847          else{
2848              this._handleResponseUpdateApptDateSaveContinue(appt, viewMode, startDateOffset, endDateOffset, callback, errorCallback, result);
2849          }
2850 };
2851 
2852 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleResponseUpdateApptDateSaveContinue =
2853 function(appt, viewMode, startDateOffset, endDateOffset, callback, errorCallback, result) {
2854     try {
2855         // NOTE: If the appt was already populated (perhaps by
2856 		//       dragging it once, canceling the change, and then
2857 		//       dragging it again), then the result will be null.
2858 		if (result) {
2859 			result.getResponse();
2860 		}
2861 		var apptStartDate = appt.startDate;
2862 		var apptEndDate   = appt.endDate;
2863 	    var apptDuration = appt.getDuration();
2864 
2865 		appt.setViewMode(viewMode);
2866 		if (startDateOffset) {
2867 			var sd = (viewMode == ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SINGLE_INSTANCE) ? appt.getUniqueStartDate() : new Date(appt.getStartTime());
2868 			appt.setStartDate(new Date(sd.getTime() + startDateOffset));
2869 			appt.resetRepeatWeeklyDays();
2870 		}
2871 		if (endDateOffset) {
2872 			var endDateTime;
2873 
2874 			if (viewMode === ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SINGLE_INSTANCE) {
2875 				// For some reason the recurring all day events have their end date set to the next day while the normal all day events don't.
2876 				// For e.g. an event with startDate 9th June and endDate 10th June when dragged to the next day has varying results:
2877 				// -> Regular all day event has end Date as 9th June which with endDateOffset results in 10th June as new endDate
2878 				// -> Recurring all day event has end Date as 10th June which with endDateOffset results in 11th June as new endDate
2879 				// To tackle this the new End date is now calculated from the new start date and appt duration and equivalent of 1 day is subtracted from it.
2880 				// TODO: Need a better solution for this -> investigate why the end date difference is present in the first place.
2881 				if (appt.allDayEvent) {
2882 					endDateTime = appt.getStartTime() + apptDuration - AjxDateUtil.MSEC_PER_DAY;
2883 				}
2884 				else {
2885 					endDateTime = appt.getUniqueEndDate().getTime() + endDateOffset;
2886 				}
2887 			}
2888 			else {
2889 				endDateTime = appt.getEndTime()  + endDateOffset;
2890 			}
2891 			appt.setEndDate(new Date(endDateTime));
2892 		}
2893 
2894 		if (viewMode == ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SINGLE_INSTANCE) {
2895 			//bug: 32231 - use proper timezone while creating exceptions
2896 			appt.setOrigTimezone(AjxTimezone.getServerId(AjxTimezone.DEFAULT));
2897 		}
2898 
2899 		if(!appt.getTimezone()) appt.setTimezone(AjxTimezone.getServerId(AjxTimezone.DEFAULT));
2900 		var respCallback    = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleResponseUpdateApptDateSave2, [callback]);
2901 		var respErrCallback = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleResponseUpdateApptDateSave2, [errorCallback, appt, apptStartDate, apptEndDate]);
2902 		appCtxt.getShell().setBusy(true);
2903 
2904         var action = appt.inviteNeverSent ? ZmCalItemComposeController.SAVE_CLOSE :
2905                                             ZmCalItemComposeController.SEND;
2906         this._saveSimpleAppt(true, appt, action, respCallback, respErrCallback, respErrCallback);
2907 	} catch (ex) {
2908 		appCtxt.getShell().setBusy(false);
2909 		if (ex.msg) {
2910 			this.popupErrorDialog(AjxMessageFormat.format(ZmMsg.mailSendFailure, ex.msg));
2911 		} else {
2912 			this.popupErrorDialog(ZmMsg.errorGeneric, ex);
2913 		}
2914 		if (errorCallback) errorCallback.run(ex);
2915 	}
2916 	if (callback) callback.run(result);
2917 }

2920           var dialog = appCtxt.getYesNoMsgDialog();
2921 		  dialog.setMessage(ZmMsg.recurrenceUpdateWarning, DwtMessageDialog.WARNING_STYLE);
2922           dialog.registerCallback(DwtDialog.YES_BUTTON, this._handleExceptionWarningResponse, this,[dialog,yesCB]);
2923           dialog.registerCallback(DwtDialog.NO_BUTTON, this._handleExceptionWarningResponse,this,[dialog,noCB]);
2924 		  dialog.popup();
2925 }

2929           else{this._refreshAction(true);}
2930           if(dialog){

2932           }
2933 }

2955 /**
2956  * Gets the day tool tip text.
2957  * 
2958  * @param	{Date}		date		the date
2959  * @param	{Boolean}	noheader	if <code>true</code>, do not include tool tip header
2960  * @param	{AjxCallback}	callback		the callback
2961  */
2962 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getDayToolTipText =
2963 function(date, noheader, callback, isMinical) {
2964 	try {
2965 		var start = new Date(date.getTime());
2966 		start.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0);
2967 		var startTime = start.getTime();
2968 		var end = start.getTime() + AjxDateUtil.MSEC_PER_DAY;
2969 		var params = {start:startTime, end:end, fanoutAllDay:true};
2970 		if(callback) {
2971 			params.callback = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleToolTipSearchResponse, [start, noheader, callback, isMinical]);
2972 			this.getApptSummaries(params);
2973 		} else {
2974 			var result = this.getApptSummaries(params);
2975 			return ZmApptViewHelper.getDayToolTipText(start, result, this, noheader, null, isMinical);
2976 		}
2977 	} catch (ex) {
2978 		DBG.println(ex);
2979 		return "<b>" + ZmMsg.errorGettingAppts + "</b>";
2980 	}
2981 };
2982 
2983 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleToolTipSearchResponse =
2984 function(start, noheader, callback, isMinical, result) {
2985 	try {
2986 		var tooltip = ZmApptViewHelper.getDayToolTipText(start, result, this, noheader, null, isMinical);
2987 		callback.run(tooltip);
2988 	} catch (ex) {
2989 		DBG.println(ex);
2990 		callback.run("<b>" + ZmMsg.errorGettingAppts + "</b>");
2991 	}
2992 };

2995 function(start, end, noheader, email, emptyMsg, calIds) {
2996 	try {
2997         if(!calIds) {
2998             calIds = [];
2999             if (this._calTreeController) {
3000                 var calendars = this._calTreeController.getOwnedCalendars(this._app.getOverviewId(),email);
3001                 for (var i = 0; i < calendars.length; i++) {

3003                     if (cal && (cal.nId != ZmFolder.ID_TRASH)) {
3004                         calIds.push(appCtxt.multiAccounts ? cal.id : cal.nId);
3005                     }
3006                 }
3007             }
3008

3010                 return "<b>" + ZmMsg.statusFree + "</b>";
3011             }
3012         }
3013

3015 		var endTime = end.getTime();

3018 		dayStart.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0);
3019

3021

3023 		// day first before getting the appts for selected time interval
3024 		this.getApptSummaries({start:dayStart.getTime(), end:dayEnd.getTime(), fanoutAllDay:true, folderIds: calIds});
3025

3027 
3028 		return ZmApptViewHelper.getDayToolTipText(start, result, this, noheader, emptyMsg);
3029 	} catch (ex) {
3030 		DBG.println(ex);
3031 		return "<b>" + ZmMsg.meetingStatusUnknown + "</b>";
3032 	}

3046 ZmCalViewController.prototype.processInlineCalSearch =
3047 function() {
3048 	var srchResponse = window.inlineCalSearchResponse;
3049 	if (!srchResponse) { return; }
3050 
3051 	var params = srchResponse.search;
3052 	var response = srchResponse.Body;
3053 
3054 	if (params instanceof Array) {
3055 		params = params[0];
3056 	}
3057 
3058 	var viewId = this._currentViewId || this.getDefaultViewType();
3059 	var fanoutAllDay = (viewId == ZmId.VIEW_CAL_MONTH);
3060 	var searchParams = {start: params.s, end: params.e, fanoutAllDay: fanoutAllDay, callback: null};
3061 	searchParams.folderIds = params.l ? params.l.split(",") : []; 
3062 	searchParams.query = "";
3063 
3064 	var miniCalParams = this.getMiniCalendarParams();
3065 	miniCalParams.folderIds = searchParams.folderIds;
3066 
3067 	this.apptCache.setSearchParams(searchParams);
3068 	this.apptCache.processBatchResponse(response.BatchResponse, searchParams, miniCalParams);
3069 };

3092 ZmCalViewController.prototype._resetOperations =
3093 function(parent, num) {
3094     if (!parent) return;
3095 
3096 	parent.enableAll(true);
3097 	var currViewName = this._viewMgr.getCurrentViewName();
3098     parent.enable(ZmOperation.TAG_MENU, appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.TAGGING_ENABLED) && !appCtxt.isWebClientOffline());
3099 
3100 	if (currViewName == ZmId.VIEW_CAL_LIST && num > 1) { return; }
3101 
3102     this._setNavToolbarPosition(this._navToolBar[ZmId.VIEW_CAL], currViewName);
3103 
3104     var appt = this.getSelection()[0];
3105     var calendar = appt && appt.getFolder();
3106     var isTrash = calendar && calendar.nId == ZmOrganizer.ID_TRASH;
3107     num = ( isTrash && this.getCurrentListView() ) ? this.getCurrentListView().getSelectionCount() : num ;
3108     var isReadOnly = calendar ? calendar.isReadOnly() : false;
3109     var isSynced = Boolean(calendar && calendar.url);
3110     var isShared = calendar ? calendar.isRemote() : false;
3111     var disabled = isSynced || isReadOnly || (num == 0) || appCtxt.isWebClientOffline();
3112     var isPrivate = appt && appt.isPrivate() && calendar.isRemote() && !calendar.hasPrivateAccess();
3113     var isForwardable = !isTrash && calendar && !calendar.isReadOnly() && appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.GROUP_CALENDAR_ENABLED) && !appCtxt.isWebClientOffline();
3114     var isReplyable = !isTrash && appt && (num == 1) && !appCtxt.isWebClientOffline();
3115     var isTrashMultiple = isTrash && (num && num>1);
3116 
3117     parent.enable([ZmOperation.REPLY, ZmOperation.REPLY_ALL], (isReplyable && !isTrashMultiple));
3118     parent.enable(ZmOperation.TAG_MENU, ((!isReadOnly && !isSynced && num > 0) || isTrashMultiple) && !appCtxt.isWebClientOffline());
3119     parent.enable(ZmOperation.VIEW_APPOINTMENT, !isPrivate && !isTrashMultiple);
3120     parent.enable([ZmOperation.FORWARD_APPT, ZmOperation.FORWARD_APPT_INSTANCE, ZmOperation.FORWARD_APPT_SERIES], isForwardable
3121                   && !isTrashMultiple  && !appCtxt.isWebClientOffline());
3122     parent.enable(ZmOperation.PROPOSE_NEW_TIME, !isTrash && (appt && !appt.isOrganizer()) && !isTrashMultiple && !appCtxt.isWebClientOffline());
3123     parent.enable(ZmOperation.SHOW_ORIG, num == 1 && appt && appt.getRestUrl() != null && !isTrashMultiple  && !appCtxt.isWebClientOffline());

3130     parent.enable(ZmOperation.DUPLICATE_APPT,apptAccess && !isTrashMultiple && this._app.containsWritableFolder() && !appCtxt.isWebClientOffline());
3131     parent.enable(ZmOperation.SHOW_ORIG,apptAccess && !isTrashMultiple  && !appCtxt.isWebClientOffline());
3132

3134 		parent.enable(ZmOperation.PRINT_CALENDAR, num > 0);
3135 	} */

3137

3139 	var op = ZmCalViewController.VIEW_TO_OP[currViewName];
3140 	// setSelected on a Toolbar; Do nothing for an ActionMenu

3210 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleApptRespondAction =
3211 function(ev) {
3212 	var appt = this.getSelection()[0];
3213     if(!appt){return;}
3214 	var type = ev.item.getData(ZmOperation.KEY_ID);
3215 	var op = ev.item.parent.getData(ZmOperation.KEY_ID);
3216 	var respCallback = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleResponseHandleApptRespondAction, [appt, type, op, null]);
3217 	appt.getDetails(null, respCallback, this._errorCallback);

3220 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleResponseHandleApptRespondAction =
3221 function(appt, type, op, callback) {
3222 	var msgController = this._getMsgController();
3223 	msgController.setMsg(appt.message);
3224 	// poke the msgController
3225 	var instanceDate = op == ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_INSTANCE ? new Date(appt.uniqStartTime) : null;
3226 
3227     if(type == ZmOperation.REPLY_DECLINE) {
3228         var promptCallback = new AjxCallback(this, this._sendInviteReply, [type, instanceDate]);
3229         this._promptDeclineNotify(appt, promptCallback, callback);
3230     }else {
3231         msgController._sendInviteReply(type, appt.compNum || 0, instanceDate, appt.getRemoteFolderOwner(), false, null, null, callback);
3232     }
3233 };

3235 ZmCalViewController.prototype._promptDeclineNotify =
3236 function(appt, promptCallback, callback) {
3237 	if (!this._declineNotifyDialog) {
3238 		var msg = ZmMsg.confirmDeclineAppt;
3239 		this._declineNotifyDialog = new ZmApptDeleteNotifyDialog({
3240 			parent: this._shell,
3241 			title: AjxMsg.confirmTitle,
3242 			confirmMsg: msg,
3243 			choiceLabel1: ZmMsg.dontNotifyOrganizer,
3244 			choiceLabel2 : ZmMsg.notifyOrganizer
3245 		});
3246 	}
3247 	this._declineNotifyDialog.popup(new AjxCallback(this, this._declineNotifyYesCallback, [appt, promptCallback, callback]));
3248 };

3253     if(promptCallback) promptCallback.run(appt, notifyOrg, callback);

3263 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleApptEditRespondAction =
3264 function(ev) {
3265 	var appt = this.getSelection()[0];
3266 	var id = ev.item.getData(ZmOperation.KEY_ID);
3267 	var op = ev.item.parent.parent.parent.getData(ZmOperation.KEY_ID);
3268 	var respCallback = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleResponseHandleApptEditRespondAction, [appt, id, op]);
3269 	appt.getDetails(null, respCallback, this._errorCallback);
3270 };
3271 
3272 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleResponseHandleApptEditRespondAction =
3273 function(appt, id, op) {
3274 	var msgController = this._getMsgController();
3275 	var msg = appt.message;
3276 	msg.subject = msg.subject || appt.name;
3277 	if (!msg.getAddress(AjxEmailAddress.REPLY_TO)) {
3278 		msg.setAddress(AjxEmailAddress.REPLY_TO, new AjxEmailAddress(appt.organizer));
3279 	}
3280 	msgController.setMsg(msg);
3281 
3282 	// poke the msgController
3283 	switch (id) {
3284 		case ZmOperation.EDIT_REPLY_ACCEPT: 	id = ZmOperation.REPLY_ACCEPT; break;
3285 		case ZmOperation.EDIT_REPLY_DECLINE: 	id = ZmOperation.REPLY_DECLINE; break;
3286 		case ZmOperation.EDIT_REPLY_TENTATIVE: 	id = ZmOperation.REPLY_TENTATIVE; break;
3287 	}
3288 	var instanceDate = op == ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_INSTANCE ? new Date(appt.uniqStartTime) : null;
3289 	msgController._editInviteReply(id, 0, instanceDate, appt.getRemoteFolderOwner());
3290 };

3292 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleError =
3293 function(ex) {
3294 	if (ex.code == 'mail.INVITE_OUT_OF_DATE' ||	ex.code == 'mail.NO_SUCH_APPT') {
3295 		var msgDialog = appCtxt.getMsgDialog();
3296 		msgDialog.registerCallback(DwtDialog.OK_BUTTON, this._handleError2, this, [msgDialog]);
3297 		msgDialog.setMessage(ZmMsg.apptOutOfDate, DwtMessageDialog.INFO_STYLE);
3298 		msgDialog.popup();
3299 		return true;
3300 	}
3301 	return false;
3302 };

3304 ZmCalViewController.prototype._handleError2 =
3305 function(msgDialog) {
3306 	msgDialog.unregisterCallback(DwtDialog.OK_BUTTON);
3307 	msgDialog.popdown();
3308 	this._refreshAction(false);
3309 };

3338 /**
3339  * Overrides ZmListController.prototype._initializeActionMenu
3340  * 
3341  * @private
3342  */
3343 ZmCalViewController.prototype._initializeActionMenu =
3344 function() {
3345 	this._actionMenu = this._createActionMenu(this._getActionMenuOps());
3346 	if (appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.TAGGING_ENABLED)) {
3347 		this._setupTagMenu(this._actionMenu);
3348 	}
3349 
3350 	var recurrenceModeOps = this._getRecurrenceModeOps();
3351 	var params = {parent: this._shell, menuItems: recurrenceModeOps};
3352 	this._recurrenceModeActionMenu = new ZmActionMenu(params);
3353 	for (var i = 0; i < recurrenceModeOps.length; i++) {
3354 		var recurrenceMode = recurrenceModeOps[i];
3355 		var modeItem = this._recurrenceModeActionMenu.getMenuItem(recurrenceMode);
3356 		var menuOpsForMode = this._getActionMenuOps(recurrenceMode);
3357 		var actionMenuForMode = this._createActionMenu(menuOpsForMode, modeItem, recurrenceMode);
3358 		if (appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.TAGGING_ENABLED)) {
3359 			this._setupTagMenu(actionMenuForMode);
3360 		}
3361 		modeItem.setMenu(actionMenuForMode);
3362 		// NOTE: Target object for listener is menu item
3363 		var menuItemListener = this._recurrenceModeMenuPopup.bind(modeItem);
3364 		modeItem.addListener(AjxEnv.isIE ? DwtEvent.ONMOUSEENTER : DwtEvent.ONMOUSEOVER, menuItemListener);
3365 	}
3366 	this._recurrenceModeActionMenu.addPopdownListener(this._menuPopdownListener);
3367 };
3368 
3369 ZmCalViewController.prototype._createActionMenu =
3370 function(menuItems, parentMenuItem, context) {
3371 	var params = {parent: parentMenuItem || this._shell, menuItems: menuItems, context: this._getMenuContext() + (context ? "_" + context : "")};
3372 	var actionMenu = new ZmActionMenu(params);
3373 	menuItems = actionMenu.opList;
3374 	for (var i = 0; i < menuItems.length; i++) {
3375 		var menuItem = menuItems[i];
3376 		if (menuItem == ZmOperation.INVITE_REPLY_MENU) {
3377 			var menu = actionMenu.getOp(ZmOperation.INVITE_REPLY_MENU).getMenu();
3378 			menu.addSelectionListener(ZmOperation.EDIT_REPLY_ACCEPT, this._listeners[ZmOperation.EDIT_REPLY_ACCEPT]);
3379 			menu.addSelectionListener(ZmOperation.EDIT_REPLY_TENTATIVE, this._listeners[ZmOperation.EDIT_REPLY_TENTATIVE]);
3380 			menu.addSelectionListener(ZmOperation.EDIT_REPLY_DECLINE, this._listeners[ZmOperation.EDIT_REPLY_DECLINE]);
3381 		} else if (menuItem == ZmOperation.CAL_VIEW_MENU) {
3382 			var menu = actionMenu.getOp(ZmOperation.CAL_VIEW_MENU).getMenu();
3383 			this._initCalViewMenu(menu);
3384 		}
3385 		if (this._listeners[menuItem]) {
3386 			actionMenu.addSelectionListener(menuItem, this._listeners[menuItem]);
3387 		}
3388 	}
3389 	actionMenu.addPopdownListener(this._menuPopdownListener);
3390 	return actionMenu;
3391 };

3407 /**
3408  * Overrides ZmListController.prototype._getActionMenuOptions
3409  * 
3410  * @private
3411  */
3412 ZmCalViewController.prototype._getActionMenuOps =
3413 function(recurrenceMode) {
3414 
3415 	var deleteOp = ZmOperation.DELETE;
3416 	var viewOp = ZmOperation.VIEW_APPOINTMENT;
3417 	var forwardOp = ZmOperation.FORWARD_APPT;
3418 
3419 	if (recurrenceMode == ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_INSTANCE) {
3420 		deleteOp = ZmOperation.DELETE_INSTANCE;
3421 		viewOp = ZmOperation.OPEN_APPT_INSTANCE;
3422 		forwardOp = ZmOperation.FORWARD_APPT_INSTANCE;
3423 	} else if (recurrenceMode == ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_SERIES) {
3424 		deleteOp = ZmOperation.DELETE_SERIES;
3425 		viewOp = ZmOperation.OPEN_APPT_SERIES;
3426 		forwardOp = ZmOperation.FORWARD_APPT_SERIES;
3427 	}
3428 	
3429 	var retVal = [viewOp,
3430 	      		ZmOperation.PRINT,
3431 	      		ZmOperation.SEP,
3432 	    		ZmOperation.REPLY_ACCEPT,
3433 	    		ZmOperation.REPLY_TENTATIVE,
3434 	    		ZmOperation.REPLY_DECLINE,
3435 	    		ZmOperation.INVITE_REPLY_MENU,
3436                 ZmOperation.PROPOSE_NEW_TIME,
3437                 ZmOperation.REINVITE_ATTENDEES,
3438 	    		ZmOperation.DUPLICATE_APPT,
3439 	    		ZmOperation.SEP,
3440 	    		ZmOperation.REPLY,
3441 	    		ZmOperation.REPLY_ALL,
3442 	    		forwardOp,
3443 	    		deleteOp,
3444 	    		ZmOperation.SEP];
3445 	if (recurrenceMode != ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_INSTANCE) {
3446 		retVal.push(ZmOperation.MOVE);
3447 	}
3448 	retVal.push(ZmOperation.TAG_MENU);
3449 	retVal.push(ZmOperation.SHOW_ORIG);
3450     //retVal.push(ZmOperation.QUICK_COMMANDS);
3451 	return retVal;
3452 };
3453 
3454 ZmCalViewController.prototype._getRecurrenceModeOps =
3455 function() {
3456 	return [ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_INSTANCE, ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_SERIES];
3457 };

3459 ZmCalViewController.prototype._enableActionMenuReplyOptions =
3460 function(appt, actionMenu) {
3461 
3462     if (!(appt && actionMenu)) {
3463         return;
3464     }
3465     var isExternalAccount = appCtxt.isExternalAccount();
3466     var isFolderReadOnly = appt.isFolderReadOnly();
3467 	var isShared = appt.isShared();
3468 
3469 	//Note - isOrganizer means the Calendar is the organizer of the appt. i.e. the appointment was created on this calendar.
3470 	//This could be "true" even if the current user is just a sharee of the calendar.
3471 	var isTheCalendarOrganizer = appt.isOrganizer();
3472 
3473 	// find the checked calendar for this appt
3474 	var calendar;
3475 	var folderId = appt.getLocalFolderId();
3476 	var calendars = this.getCheckedCalendars(true);
3477 	for (var i = 0; i < calendars.length; i++) {
3478 		if (calendars[i].id == folderId) {
3479 			calendar = calendars[i];
3480 			break;
3481 		}
3482 	}
3483     //bug:68452 if its a trash folder then its not present in the calendars array
3484     if (!calendar){
3485         calendar = appt.getFolder();
3486     }
3487 	var share = calendar && calendar.link ? calendar.getMainShare() : null;
3488 	var workflow = share ? share.isWorkflow() : true;
3489     var isTrash = calendar && calendar.nId == ZmOrganizer.ID_TRASH;
3490 	var isPrivate = appt.isPrivate() && calendar.isRemote() && !calendar.hasPrivateAccess();
3491     var isReplyable = !isTrash && appt.otherAttendees;
3492 	var isForwardable = !isTrash && calendar && !calendar.isReadOnly() && appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.GROUP_CALENDAR_ENABLED);
3493 
3494 	//don't show for organizer calendar, or readOnly attendee calendar.
3495 	var showAcceptDecline = !isTheCalendarOrganizer && !isFolderReadOnly;
3496 	actionMenu.setItemVisible(ZmOperation.REPLY_ACCEPT, showAcceptDecline);
3497 	actionMenu.setItemVisible(ZmOperation.REPLY_DECLINE, showAcceptDecline);
3498 	actionMenu.setItemVisible(ZmOperation.REPLY_TENTATIVE, showAcceptDecline);
3499 	actionMenu.setItemVisible(ZmOperation.INVITE_REPLY_MENU, showAcceptDecline);
3500 	actionMenu.setItemVisible(ZmOperation.PROPOSE_NEW_TIME, showAcceptDecline);
3501     actionMenu.setItemVisible(ZmOperation.REINVITE_ATTENDEES, !isTrash && isTheCalendarOrganizer && !isFolderReadOnly && !appt.inviteNeverSent && appt.otherAttendees);
3502     actionMenu.setItemVisible(ZmOperation.TAG_MENU, appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.TAGGING_ENABLED));
3503 
3504     // Initially enabling all the options in the action menu. And then selectively disabling unsupported options for special users.
3505     actionMenu.enableAll(true);
3506 
3507 	//enable/disable specific actions, only if we actually show them. (we don't show for organizer or shared calendar)
3508 	if (showAcceptDecline) {
3509 		var enabled = isReplyable && workflow && !isPrivate && !isExternalAccount;
3510         actionMenu.enable(ZmOperation.REPLY_ACCEPT, enabled && appt.ptst != ZmCalBaseItem.PSTATUS_ACCEPT);
3511         actionMenu.enable(ZmOperation.REPLY_DECLINE, enabled && appt.ptst != ZmCalBaseItem.PSTATUS_DECLINED);
3512         actionMenu.enable(ZmOperation.REPLY_TENTATIVE, enabled && appt.ptst != ZmCalBaseItem.PSTATUS_TENTATIVE);
3513         actionMenu.enable(ZmOperation.INVITE_REPLY_MENU, enabled);
3514 		// edit reply menu
3515 		var mi = enabled && actionMenu.getMenuItem(ZmOperation.INVITE_REPLY_MENU);
3516 		var replyMenu = mi && mi.getMenu();
3517 		if (replyMenu) {
3518 			replyMenu.enable(ZmOperation.EDIT_REPLY_ACCEPT,	appt.ptst != ZmCalBaseItem.PSTATUS_ACCEPT);
3519 			replyMenu.enable(ZmOperation.EDIT_REPLY_DECLINE, appt.ptst != ZmCalBaseItem.PSTATUS_DECLINED);
3520 			replyMenu.enable(ZmOperation.EDIT_REPLY_TENTATIVE, appt.ptst != ZmCalBaseItem.PSTATUS_TENTATIVE);
3521 		}
3522 	}
3523 
3524     actionMenu.enable([ZmOperation.FORWARD_APPT, ZmOperation.FORWARD_APPT_INSTANCE, ZmOperation.FORWARD_APPT_SERIES], isForwardable);
3525 	var myEmail = appt.getFolder().getAccount().getEmail();
3526 	//the last condition in the following is for the somewhat corner case user1 invites user2, and user1 is looking at user2's calendar as a share.
3527 	actionMenu.enable(ZmOperation.REPLY, isReplyable && !isTheCalendarOrganizer && myEmail !== appt.organizer); //the organizer can't reply just to himself
3528 	actionMenu.enable(ZmOperation.REPLY_ALL, isReplyable);
3529 
3530     var disabledOps;
3531     if(appCtxt.isWebClientOffline()) {
3532          disabledOps = [ZmOperation.REINVITE_ATTENDEES,
3533             ZmOperation.PROPOSE_NEW_TIME,
3534             ZmOperation.REPLY,
3535             ZmOperation.REPLY_ALL,
3536             ZmOperation.DUPLICATE_APPT,
3537             ZmOperation.DELETE,
3538             ZmOperation.DELETE_INSTANCE,
3539             ZmOperation.DELETE_SERIES,
3540             ZmOperation.FORWARD_APPT,
3541             ZmOperation.FORWARD_APPT_INSTANCE,
3542             ZmOperation.FORWARD_APPT_SERIES,
3543             ZmOperation.SHOW_ORIG,
3544             ZmOperation.DUPLICATE_APPT,
3545 			ZmOperation.MOVE,
3546 			ZmOperation.PRINT,
3547 			ZmOperation.TAG_MENU,
3548             ZmOperation.MOVE_MENU];
3549         actionMenu.enable(disabledOps, false);
3550     } else {
3551         if(isExternalAccount) {
3552             disabledOps = [ZmOperation.REINVITE_ATTENDEES,
3553                 ZmOperation.PROPOSE_NEW_TIME,
3554                 ZmOperation.REPLY,
3555                 ZmOperation.REPLY_ALL,
3556                 ZmOperation.DUPLICATE_APPT,
3557                 ZmOperation.DELETE,
3558                 ZmOperation.DELETE_INSTANCE,
3559                 ZmOperation.DELETE_SERIES];
3560 
3561             actionMenu.enable(disabledOps, false);
3562         }
3563 
3564         // bug:71007 Disabling unsupported options for shared calendar with view only rights
3565         if (isFolderReadOnly) {
3566             disabledOps = [ZmOperation.REINVITE_ATTENDEES,
3567                            ZmOperation.PROPOSE_NEW_TIME,
3568                            ZmOperation.DELETE,
3569                            ZmOperation.DELETE_INSTANCE,
3570                            ZmOperation.DELETE_SERIES,
3571                            ZmOperation.MOVE,
3572                            ZmOperation.TAG_MENU,
3573                            ZmOperation.MOVE_MENU];
3574 
3575             actionMenu.enable(disabledOps, false);
3576         }
3577     }
3578 
3579 	var del = actionMenu.getMenuItem(ZmOperation.DELETE);
3580 	if (del && !isTrash) {
3581 		del.setText((isTheCalendarOrganizer && appt.otherAttendees) ? ZmMsg.cancel : ZmMsg.del);
3582 		var isSynced = Boolean(calendar.url);
3583 		del.setEnabled(!calendar.isReadOnly() && !isSynced && !isPrivate && !appCtxt.isWebClientOffline());
3584 	}
3585 
3586 	// recurring action menu options
3587 	if (this._recurrenceModeActionMenu && !isTrash) {
3588 		this._recurrenceModeActionMenu.enable(ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_SERIES, !appt.exception);
3589 	}
3590 };
3591 
3592 ZmCalViewController.prototype._listActionListener =
3593 function(ev) {
3594 	ZmListController.prototype._listActionListener.call(this, ev);
3595 	var count = this.getSelectionCount();
3596 	var appt = ev.item;
3597 	var actionMenu = this.getActionMenu();
3598 	actionMenu.enableAll(count === 1);
3599 	if (count > 1) {
3600 		var isExternalAccount = appCtxt.isExternalAccount();
3601   		var isFolderReadOnly = appt.isFolderReadOnly();
3602 		var enabled = !isExternalAccount && !isFolderReadOnly;
3603 		actionMenu.enable([ZmOperation.TAG_MENU, ZmOperation.MOVE_MENU, ZmOperation.MOVE, ZmOperation.DELETE], enabled);
3604 		actionMenu.popup(0, ev.docX, ev.docY);
3605 		return;
3606 	}
3607     var calendar = appt && appt.getFolder();
3608     var isTrash = calendar && calendar.nId == ZmOrganizer.ID_TRASH;
3609 	var menu = (appt.isRecurring() && !appt.isException && !isTrash) ? this._recurrenceModeActionMenu : actionMenu;
3610 	this._enableActionMenuReplyOptions(appt, menu);
3611 	var op = (menu == actionMenu) && appt.exception ? ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_INSTANCE : null;
3612 	actionMenu.__appt = appt;
3613 	menu.setData(ZmOperation.KEY_ID, op);
3614 
3615 	if (appt.isRecurring() && !appt.isException && !isTrash) {
3616 		var menuItem = menu.getMenuItem(ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_INSTANCE);
3617 		this._setTagMenu(menuItem.getMenu());
3618 		this._enableActionMenuReplyOptions(appt, menuItem.getMenu());
3619 		menuItem = menu.getMenuItem(ZmOperation.VIEW_APPT_SERIES);
3620 		this._setTagMenu(menuItem.getMenu());
3621 		this._enableActionMenuReplyOptions(appt, menuItem.getMenu());
3622 	}
3623 	menu.popup(0, ev.docX, ev.docY);
3624 };

3629     this._viewActionMenu = null;

3632 ZmCalViewController.prototype._viewActionListener =
3633 function(ev) {
3634 	if (!this._viewActionMenu) {
3635 		var menuItems = this._getViewActionMenuOps();
3636 		if (!menuItems) return;
3637 		var overrides = {};
3638 		overrides[ZmOperation.TODAY] = {textKey:"todayGoto"};
3639 		var params = {parent:this._shell, menuItems:menuItems, overrides:overrides};
3640 		this._viewActionMenu = new ZmActionMenu(params);
3641 		menuItems = this._viewActionMenu.opList;
3642 		for (var i = 0; i < menuItems.length; i++) {
3643 			var menuItem = menuItems[i];
3644 			if (menuItem == ZmOperation.CAL_VIEW_MENU) {
3645 				var menu = this._viewActionMenu.getOp(ZmOperation.CAL_VIEW_MENU).getMenu();
3646 				this._initCalViewMenu(menu);
3647 			} else if (this._listeners[menuItem]) {
3648 				this._viewActionMenu.addSelectionListener(menuItem, this._listeners[menuItem]);
3649                 if ((menuItem == ZmOperation.NEW_APPT) || (menuItem == ZmOperation.NEW_ALLDAY_APPT)) {
3650                     this._viewActionMenu.enable(menuItem, !appCtxt.isWebClientOffline());
3651                 }
3652 			}
3653 		}
3654         this._viewActionMenu.addPopdownListener(this._menuPopdownListener);
3655 	}
3656 
3657 	if ( this._viewVisible && this._currentViewType == ZmId.VIEW_CAL_DAY) {
3658         var calId = ev.target.getAttribute(ZmCalDayTabView.ATTR_CAL_ID);
3659         if(!calId) {
3660             var view = this._viewMgr.getView(this._currentViewId);
3661             var gridLoc = Dwt.toWindow(ev.target, ev.elementX, ev.elementY, ev.target, true);
3662             var col = view._getColFromX(gridLoc.x);
3663             calId = (col && col.cal) ? col.cal.id : null;
3664         }
3665         this._viewActionMenu._calendarId = calId;
3666 	} else {
3667 		this._viewActionMenu._calendarId = null;
3668 	}
3669 
3670 	this._viewActionMenu.__view = ev.item;
3671 	this._viewActionMenu.popup(0, ev.docX, ev.docY);
3672 };
3673 
3674 ZmCalViewController.prototype._dropListener =
3675 function(ev) {
3676 	var view = this._listView[this._currentViewId];
3677 	var div = view.getTargetItemDiv(ev.uiEvent);
3678 	var item = div ? view.getItemFromElement(div) : null;
3679 
3680 	// only tags can be dropped on us *if* we are not readonly
3681 	if (ev.action == DwtDropEvent.DRAG_ENTER) {
3682 		if (item && item.type == ZmItem.APPT) {
3683 			var calendar = item.getFolder();
3684 			var isReadOnly = calendar ? calendar.isReadOnly() : false;
3685 			var isSynced = Boolean(calendar && calendar.url);
3686 			if (isSynced || isReadOnly  || appCtxt.isWebClientOffline()) {
3687 				ev.doIt = false; // can't tag a GAL or shared contact
3688 				view.dragSelect(div);
3689 				return;
3690 			}
3691 		}
3692 	}
3693 
3694 	ZmListController.prototype._dropListener.call(this, ev);
3695 };

3700 		return appCtxt.getAppController().sendRequest({soapDoc: soapDoc});
3701 	} catch (ex) {
3702 		// do nothing
3703 		return null;
3704 	}
3705 };

3707 /**
3708  * Caller is responsible for exception handling. caller should also not modify
3709  * appts in this list directly.
3710  *
3711  * @param	{Hash}		params		a hash of parameters
3712  * @param	{long}	params.start 			the start time (in milliseconds)
3713  * @param	{long}	params.end				the end time (in milliseconds)
3714  * @param	{Boolean}	params.fanoutAllDay	if <code>true</code>, 
3715  * @param	{Array}	params.folderIds		the list of calendar folder Id's (null means use checked calendars in overview)
3716  * @param	{AjxCallback}	params.callback		the callback triggered once search results are returned
3717  * @param	{Boolean}	params.noBusyOverlay	if <code>true</code>, do not show veil during search
3718  * 
3719  * @private
3720  */
3721 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getApptSummaries =
3722 function(params) {
3723 	if (!params.folderIds) {
3724 		params.folderIds = this.getCheckedCalendarFolderIds();
3725 	}
3726 	params.query = this._userQuery;
3727 
3728 	return this.apptCache.getApptSummaries(params);
3729 };
3730 
3731 ZmCalViewController.prototype.handleUserSearch =
3732 function(params, callback) {
3733 	AjxDispatcher.require(["MailCore", "CalendarCore", "Calendar"]);
3734 	//Calendar search is defaulted to list view when searched from the calendar app.
3735 	if (params.origin === ZmId.SEARCH) {
3736 		this.show(ZmId.VIEW_CAL_LIST, null, true);
3737 	}
3738 	else {
3739 		this.show(null, null, true);
3740 	}
3741 
3742 	this.apptCache.clearCache();
3743 	this._viewMgr.setNeedsRefresh();
3744 	this._userQuery = params.query;
3745 
3746 	// set start/end date boundaries
3747 	var view = this._listView[this._currentViewId];
3748 
3749 	if (view) {
3750 		var rt = view.getTimeRange();
3751 		params.start = rt.start;
3752 		params.end = rt.end;
3753 	} else if (this._miniCalendar) {
3754 		var calRange = this._miniCalendar.getDateRange();
3755 		params.start = calRange.start.getTime();
3756 		params.end = calRange.end.getTime();
3757 	} else {
3758 		// TODO - generate start/end based on current month?
3759 	}
3760 
3761 	params.fanoutAllDay = view && view._fanoutAllDay();
3762 	params.callback = this._searchResponseCallback.bind(this, callback);
3763 
3764 	this.getApptSummaries(params);
3765 };
3766 
3767 ZmCalViewController.prototype._searchResponseCallback =
3768 function(callback, list, userQuery, result) {
3769 
3770 	this.show(null, null, true);	// always make sure a calendar view is being shown
3771 	this._userQuery = userQuery;	// cache the user-entered search query
3772 
3773 	this._maintGetApptCallback(ZmCalViewController.MAINT_VIEW, this._listView[this._currentViewId], list, true, userQuery);
3774 
3775 	if (callback) {
3776 		callback.run(result);
3777 	}
3778 };

3792 ZmCalViewController.prototype.notifyDelete =
3793 function(ids) {
3794     if (this._modifyAppts) {
3795         var apptList = this._viewMgr.getSubContentView().getApptList();
3796         for (var i = 0; i < ids.length; i++) {
3797             var appt = ZmCalViewController.__AjxVector_getById(apptList, ids[i])
3798             if (appt) {
3799                 apptList.remove(appt);
3800                 this._modifyAppts.removes++;
3801             }
3802         }
3803     }
3804 
3805 	if (this._clearCache) { return; }
3806 
3807 	this._clearCache = this.apptCache.containsAnyId(ids);
3808 	this.handleEditConflict(ids);
3809 };

3811 ZmCalViewController.prototype.handleEditConflict =
3812 function(ids) {
3813 	//handling a case where appt is edited and related calendar is deleted
3814 	if (appCtxt.getCurrentViewId() == ZmId.VIEW_APPOINTMENT) {
3815 		var view = appCtxt.getCurrentView();
3816 		var appt = view.getAppt(true);
3817 		var calendar = appt && appt.getFolder();
3818 		var idStr = ","+ ids+",";
3819 		if (idStr.indexOf("," + calendar.id + ",") >= 0) {
3820 			this._app.getApptComposeController()._closeView();
3821 		}
3822 	}
3823 };
3824 
3825 ZmCalViewController.prototype.notifyModify =
3826 function(modifies) {
3827     var apptObjs = modifies.appt;
3828     if (apptObjs && this._viewMgr) {
3829         var listView = this._viewMgr.getSubContentView();
3830         if (listView) {
3831             for (var i = 0; i < apptObjs.length; i++) {
3832                 var apptObj = apptObjs[i];
3833                 // case 1: item moved *into* Trash
3834                 if (apptObj.l == ZmOrganizer.ID_TRASH) {
3835                     this._modifyAppts.adds++;
3836                     ZmAppt.loadByUid(apptObj.uid, new AjxCallback(this, this._updateSubContent));
3837                 }
3838                 // case 2: item moved *from* Trash
3839                 else {
3840                     var apptList = listView.getApptList();
3841                     var appt = ZmCalViewController.__AjxVector_getById(apptList, apptObj.id)
3842                     if (appt) {
3843                         apptList.remove(appt);
3844                         this._modifyAppts.removes++;
3845                         // TODO: was this appointment moved to a checked calendar w/in the specified range?
3846                     }
3847                 }
3848                 // case 3: neither, ignore
3849             }
3850         }
3851     }
3852 
3853 	if (this._clearCache) { return; }
3854 
3855 	// if any of the ids are in the cache then...
3856 	for (var name in modifies) {
3857 		var list = modifies[name];
3858 		this._clearCache = this._clearCache || this.apptCache.containsAnyItem(list);
3859 	}
3860 };
3861 
3862 ZmCalViewController.__AjxVector_getById = function(vector, id) {
3863     var array = vector.getArray();
3864     for (var i = 0; i < array.length; i++) {
3865         var item = array[i];
3866         if (item.id == id) return item;
3867     }
3868     return null;
3869 };
3870 
3871 ZmCalViewController.prototype._updateSubContent = function(appt) {
3872     if (appt) {
3873         var listView = this._viewMgr.getSubContentView();
3874         if (listView) {
3875             if (!listView.hasItem(appt.id)) {
3876                 listView.getApptList().add(appt);
3877             }
3878             listView.setNeedsRefresh(true);
3879             if (!this._modifyAppts || --this._modifyAppts.adds <= 0) {
3880                 listView.refresh();
3881                 this._clearCache = true;
3882                 this.refreshHandler();
3883             }
3884         }
3885     }
3886 };
3887 
3888 // this gets called before all the above notify* methods get called
3889 ZmCalViewController.prototype.preNotify = function(notify) {
3890     DBG.println(AjxDebug.DBG2, "ZmCalViewController: preNotify");
3891     this._modifyAppts = null;
3892     if (notify.deleted || (notify.modified && notify.modified.appt)) {
3893         var listView = this._viewMgr && this._viewMgr.getSubContentView();
3894         if (listView) {
3895             this._modifyAppts = { adds: 0, removes:0 };
3896         }
3897     }
3898 };
3899 
3900 // this gets called after all the above notify* methods get called
3901 ZmCalViewController.prototype.postNotify =
3902 function(notify) {
3903 	DBG.println(AjxDebug.DBG2, "ZmCalViewController: postNotify: " + this._clearCache);
3904 
3905     // update the trash list all at once
3906     if (this._modifyAppts) {
3907         var removes = this._modifyAppts.removes;
3908         var adds = this._modifyAppts.adds;
3909         if (removes || adds) {
3910             var listView = this._viewMgr.getSubContentView();
3911             if (listView) {
3912                 listView.setNeedsRefresh(true);
3913                 listView.refresh();
3914                 this._clearCache = true;
3915             }
3916         }
3917         this._modifyAppts.removes = 0;
3918     }
3919 
3920 	var clearCacheByFolder = false;
3921 	
3922 	for (var i in this._clearCacheFolderMap) {
3923 		DBG.println("clear cache :" + i);
3924 		this.apptCache.clearCache(i);
3925 		clearCacheByFolder = true;
3926 	}
3927 	this._clearCacheFolderMap = {};
3928 
3929 	//offline client makes batch request for each account configured causing
3930 	//refresh overlap clearing calendar
3931 	var timer = (appCtxt.isOffline && this.searchInProgress) ? 1000 : 0;
3932 	
3933 	if (this._clearCache) {
3934 		var act = new AjxTimedAction(this, this._refreshAction);
3935 		AjxTimedAction.scheduleAction(act, timer);
3936 		this._clearCache = false;
3937 	} else if(clearCacheByFolder) {
3938 		var act = new AjxTimedAction(this, this._refreshAction, [true]);
3939 		AjxTimedAction.scheduleAction(act, timer);
3940 	}
3941 };

3944 function(refresh) {
3945 	if (this._viewMgr != null && this._viewMgr.setNeedsRefresh) {
3946 		this._viewMgr.setNeedsRefresh(refresh);
3947 	}
3948 };

3950 // returns true if moving given appt from local to remote folder or vice versa
3951 ZmCalViewController.prototype.isMovingBetwAccounts =
3952 function(appts, newFolderId) {
3953 	appts = (!(appts instanceof Array)) ? [appts] : appts;
3954 	var isMovingBetw = false;
3955 	for (var i = 0; i < appts.length; i++) {
3956 		var appt = appts[i];
3957 		if (!appt.isReadOnly() && appt._orig && appt.otherAttendees && !appCtxt.isWebClientOffline()) {
3958 			var origFolder = appt._orig.getFolder();
3959 			var newFolder = appCtxt.getById(newFolderId);
3960 			if (origFolder && newFolder) {
3961 				if ((origFolder.id != newFolderId) &&
3962 					((origFolder.link && !newFolder.link) || (!origFolder.link && newFolder.link)))
3963 				{
3964 					isMovingBetw = true;
3965 					break;
3966 				}
3967 			}
3968 		}
3969 	}
3970 
3971 	return isMovingBetw;
3972 };
3973 
3974 // returns true if moving given read-only invite appt between accounts
3975 ZmCalViewController.prototype.isMovingBetwAcctsAsAttendee =
3976 function(appts, newFolderId) {
3977 	appts = (!(appts instanceof Array)) ? [appts] : appts;
3978 	var isMovingBetw = false;
3979 	for (var i = 0; i < appts.length; i++) {
3980 		var appt = appts[i];
3981 		if (appt.isReadOnly() && appt._orig) {
3982 			var origFolder = appt._orig.getFolder();
3983 			var newFolder = appCtxt.getById(newFolderId);
3984 			if (origFolder && newFolder) {
3985 				if ((origFolder.id != newFolderId) && origFolder.owner != newFolder.owner)
3986 				{
3987 					isMovingBetw = true;
3988 					break;
3989 				}
3990 			}
3991 		}
3992 	}
3993 
3994 	return isMovingBetw;
3995 };

3997 // this gets called when we get a refresh block from the server
3998 ZmCalViewController.prototype.refreshHandler =
3999 function() {
4000 	var act = new AjxTimedAction(this, this._refreshAction);
4001 	AjxTimedAction.scheduleAction(act, 0);
4002 };

4004 ZmCalViewController.prototype._refreshAction =
4005 function(dontClearCache) {
4006 	DBG.println(AjxDebug.DBG1, "ZmCalViewController: _refreshAction: " + dontClearCache);
4007 	var forceMaintenance = false;
4008 	// reset cache
4009 	if (!dontClearCache) {
4010 		this.apptCache.clearCache();
4011 		forceMaintenance = true;
4012 	}
4013 
4014 	if (this._viewMgr != null) {
4015 		// mark all views as dirty
4016 		this._viewMgr.setNeedsRefresh(true);
4017 		this._scheduleMaintenance(ZmCalViewController.MAINT_MINICAL|ZmCalViewController.MAINT_VIEW|ZmCalViewController.MAINT_REMINDER, forceMaintenance);
4018 	} else if (this._miniCalendar != null) {
4019 		this._scheduleMaintenance(ZmCalViewController.MAINT_MINICAL|ZmCalViewController.MAINT_REMINDER, forceMaintenance);
4020 	} else {
4021 		this._scheduleMaintenance(ZmCalViewController.MAINT_REMINDER, forceMaintenance);
4022 	}
4023 };

4027 	// TODO: resched work?
4028 };

4030 ZmCalViewController.prototype._maintGetApptCallback =
4031 function(work, view, list, skipMiniCalUpdate, query) {
4032 	if (list instanceof ZmCsfeException) {
4033 		this.searchInProgress = false;
4034 		this._handleError(list, new AjxCallback(this, this._maintErrorHandler));
4035 		return;
4036 	}
4037 	DBG.println(AjxDebug.DBG2, "ZmCalViewController: _maintGetApptCallback: " + work);
4038 	this._userQuery = query;
4039 
4040 	if (work & ZmCalViewController.MAINT_VIEW) {
4041 		this._list = new ZmApptList();
4042 		this._list.getVector().addList(list);
4043 		var sel = view.getSelection();
4044 		view.set(list, skipMiniCalUpdate);
4045 
4046 		// For bug 27221, reset toolbar after refresh
4047 		view.deselectAll();
4048 		if (sel && sel.length > 0) {
4049 			var id = sel[0].id;
4050 			for (var i = 0; i < this._list.size(); i++) {
4051 				if (this._list.getArray()[i].id == id) {
4052 					view.setSelection(this._list.getArray[i],true);
4053 					break;
4054 				}
4055 			}
4056 		}
4057 		this._resetToolbarOperations();
4058 	}
4059 
4060 	if (work & ZmCalViewController.MAINT_REMINDER) {
4061 		this._app.getReminderController().refresh();
4062 	}
4063 
4064 	this.searchInProgress = false;
4065 
4066 	// initiate schedule action for pending work (process queued actions)
4067 	if (this._pendingWork != ZmCalViewController.MAINT_NONE) {
4068 		var newWork = this._pendingWork;
4069 		this._pendingWork = ZmCalViewController.MAINT_NONE;
4070 		this._scheduleMaintenance(newWork);
4071 	}
4072 };

4080         this._scheduleMaintenance(ZmCalViewController.MAINT_VIEW);
4081     }

4085 ZmCalViewController.prototype._scheduleMaintenance =
4086 function(work, forceMaintenance) {
4087 
4088 	DBG.println(AjxDebug.DBG1, "ZmCalViewController._scheduleMaintenance, work = " + work + ", forceMaintenance = " + forceMaintenance);
4089 	DBG.println(AjxDebug.DBG1, "ZmCalViewController._scheduleMaintenance, searchInProgress = " + this.searchInProgress + ", pendingWork = " + this._pendingWork);
4090 	this.onErrorRecovery = new AjxCallback(this, this._errorRecovery, [work, forceMaintenance]);
4091 
4092 	// schedule timed action
4093 	if ((!this.searchInProgress || forceMaintenance) &&
4094 		(this._pendingWork == ZmCalViewController.MAINT_NONE))
4095 	{
4096 		this._pendingWork |= work;
4097 		AjxTimedAction.scheduleAction(this._maintTimedAction, 0);
4098 	}
4099 	else
4100 	{
4101 		this._pendingWork |= work;
4102 	}
4103 };

4108     this._pendingWork = ZmCalViewController.MAINT_NONE;

4111 ZmCalViewController.prototype._errorRecovery =
4112 function(work, forceMaintenance) {
4113 	var maintainMiniCal = (work & ZmCalViewController.MAINT_MINICAL);
4114 	var maintainView = (work & ZmCalViewController.MAINT_VIEW);
4115 	var maintainRemainder = (work & ZmCalViewController.MAINT_REMINDER);
4116 	if (maintainMiniCal || maintainView || maintainRemainder) {
4117 		this.getCurrentView().setNeedsRefresh(true);
4118 	}
4119 	this._scheduleMaintenance(work, forceMaintenance);
4120 };
4121 
4122 ZmCalViewController.prototype._maintenanceAction =
4123 function() {
4124 	DBG.println(AjxDebug.DBG1, "ZmCalViewController._maintenanceAction, work = " + this._pendingWork);
4125  	var work = this._pendingWork;
4126 	this.searchInProgress = true;
4127 	this._pendingWork = ZmCalViewController.MAINT_NONE;
4128 
4129 	var maintainMiniCal = (work & ZmCalViewController.MAINT_MINICAL);
4130 	var maintainView = (work & ZmCalViewController.MAINT_VIEW);
4131 	var maintainRemainder = (work & ZmCalViewController.MAINT_REMINDER);
4132 	
4133 	if (work == ZmCalViewController.MAINT_REMINDER) {
4134 		this._app.getReminderController().refresh();
4135 		this.searchInProgress = false;
4136 	}
4137 	else if (maintainMiniCal || maintainView || maintainRemainder) {
4138         // NOTE: It's important that we go straight to the view!
4139 		var view = this._viewMgr ? this._viewMgr.getView(this._currentViewId) : null;
4140 		var needsRefresh =  view && view.needsRefresh();
4141 		DBG.println(AjxDebug.DBG1, "ZmCalViewController._maintenanceAction, view = " + this._currentViewId + ", needsRefresh = " + needsRefresh);
4142 		if (needsRefresh) {
4143             var rt = view.getTimeRange();
4144 			var params = {
4145 				start: rt.start,
4146 				end: rt.end,
4147 				fanoutAllDay: view._fanoutAllDay(),
4148 				callback: (new AjxCallback(this, this._maintGetApptCallback, [work, view])),
4149 				accountFolderIds: ([].concat(this._checkedAccountCalendarIds)), // pass in a copy, not a reference
4150 				query: this._userQuery
4151 			};
4152 
4153 			var reminderParams;
4154 			if (maintainRemainder) {
4155 				reminderParams = this._app.getReminderController().getRefreshParams();
4156 				reminderParams.callback = null;
4157 			}
4158 
4159 			DBG.println(AjxDebug.DBG1, "ZmCalViewController._maintenanceAction, do apptCache.batchRequest");
4160 			this.apptCache.batchRequest(params, this.getMiniCalendarParams(), reminderParams);
4161 			view.setNeedsRefresh(false);
4162 		} else {
4163 			this.searchInProgress = false;
4164 		}
4165 	}
4166 };

4173 ZmCalViewController.prototype.handleKeyAction =
4174 function(actionCode) {
4175 	DBG.println(AjxDebug.DBG3, "ZmCalViewController.handleKeyAction");
4176 	var isWebClientOffline = appCtxt.isWebClientOffline();
4177 
4178 	switch (actionCode) {
4179 
4180 		case ZmKeyMap.CAL_DAY_VIEW:
4181 		case ZmKeyMap.CAL_WEEK_VIEW:
4182 		case ZmKeyMap.CAL_WORK_WEEK_VIEW:
4183 		case ZmKeyMap.CAL_MONTH_VIEW:
4184 			this.show(ZmCalViewController.ACTION_CODE_TO_VIEW[actionCode]);
4185 			break;
4186 
4187 		case ZmKeyMap.CAL_LIST_VIEW:
4188 			if (!isWebClientOffline) {
4189 				this.show(ZmCalViewController.ACTION_CODE_TO_VIEW[actionCode]);
4190 			}
4191 			break;
4192 
4193         case ZmKeyMap.CAL_FB_VIEW:
4194             if(appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.FREE_BUSY_VIEW_ENABLED) && !isWebClientOffline) {
4195                 this.show(ZmCalViewController.ACTION_CODE_TO_VIEW[actionCode]);
4196             }
4197 			break;
4198 
4199 		case ZmKeyMap.TODAY:
4200 			this._todayButtonListener();
4201 			break;
4202 
4203 		case ZmKeyMap.REFRESH:
4204 			this._refreshButtonListener();
4205 			break;
4206 
4207 		case ZmKeyMap.QUICK_ADD:
4208 			if (appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.CAL_USE_QUICK_ADD) && !isWebClientOffline) {
4209 				var date = this._viewMgr ? this._viewMgr.getDate() : new Date();
4210 				this.newAppointmentHelper(date, ZmCalViewController.DEFAULT_APPOINTMENT_DURATION);
4211 			}
4212 			break;
4213 
4214 		case ZmKeyMap.EDIT:
4215 			if (!isWebClientOffline) {
4216 				var appt = this.getSelection()[0];
4217 				if (appt) {
4218 					var ev = new DwtSelectionEvent();
4219 					ev.detail = DwtListView.ITEM_DBL_CLICKED;
4220 					ev.item = appt;
4221 					this._listSelectionListener(ev);
4222 				}
4223 			}
4224 			break;
4225 
4226 		case ZmKeyMap.CANCEL:
4227             var currentView = this._viewMgr.getCurrentView();
4228             if ((this._currentViewType == ZmId.VIEW_CAL_WORK_WEEK) ||
4229                 (this._currentViewType == ZmId.VIEW_CAL_WEEK) ||
4230                 (this._currentViewType == ZmId.VIEW_CAL_MONTH)) {
4231                 // Abort - restore location and Mouse up
4232                 var data = DwtMouseEventCapture.getTargetObj();
4233                 if (data) {
4234                     currentView._restoreApptLoc(data);
4235                     currentView._cancelNewApptDrag(data);
4236                     data.startDate = data.appt ? data.appt._orig.startDate : null;
4237                     ZmCalBaseView._apptMouseUpHdlr(null);
4238                 }
4239             }
4240 			break;
4241 
4242 		default:
4243 			return ZmListController.prototype.handleKeyAction.call(this, actionCode);
4244 	}
4245 	return true;
4246 };

4253 /**
4254  * Returns a reference to the singleton message controller, used to send mail (in our case,
4255  * invites and their replies). If mail is disabled, we create our own ZmMsgController so that
4256  * we don't load the mail package.
4257  * 
4258  * @private
4259  */
4260 ZmCalViewController.prototype._getMsgController =
4261 function() {
4262 	if (!this._msgController) {
4263 		if (appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.MAIL_ENABLED)) {
4264 			this._msgController = AjxDispatcher.run("GetMsgController");
4265 		} else {
4266 			AjxDispatcher.require("Mail");
4267 			this._msgController = new ZmMsgController(this._container, this._app);
4268 		}
4269 	}
4270 	return this._msgController;
4271 };

4286 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getMiniCalCache =
4287 function() {
4288 	if (!this._miniCalCache) {
4289 		this._miniCalCache = new ZmMiniCalCache(this);
4290 	}
4291 	return this._miniCalCache;
4292 };

4320 ZmCalViewController.prototype._showApptSource =
4321 function(appt) {
4322     var apptFetchUrl = appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.CSFE_MSG_FETCHER_URI)
4323                     + "&id=" + AjxStringUtil.urlComponentEncode(appt.id || appt.invId)
4324                     +"&mime=text/plain&noAttach=1&icalAttach=none";
4325     // create a new window w/ generated msg based on msg id
4326     window.open(apptFetchUrl, "_blank", "menubar=yes,resizable=yes,scrollbars=yes");
4327 };

4329 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getAppointmentByInvite =
4330 function(invite, callback) {
4331 
4332 	var apptId = invite.getAppointmentId();
4333 	if(apptId) {
4334 		var jsonObj = {GetAppointmentRequest:{_jsns:"urn:zimbraMail"}};
4335 		var request = jsonObj.GetAppointmentRequest;
4336 		request.id = apptId;
4337 		request.includeContent = "1";
4338 
4339 		var accountName = (appCtxt.multiAccounts ? appCtxt.accountList.mainAccount.name : null);
4340 
4341 		appCtxt.getAppController().sendRequest({
4342 			jsonObj: jsonObj,
4343 			asyncMode: true,
4344 			callback: (new AjxCallback(this, this._getApptItemInfoHandler, [invite, callback])),
4345 			errorCallback: (new AjxCallback(this, this._getApptItemInfoErrorHandler, [invite, callback])),
4346 			accountName: accountName
4347 		});
4348 	}
4349 };
4350 
4351 ZmCalViewController.prototype._getApptItemInfoHandler =
4352 function(invite, callback, result) {
4353 	var resp = result.getResponse();
4354 	resp = resp.GetAppointmentResponse;
4355 
4356 	var apptList = new ZmApptList();
4357 	var apptNode = resp.appt[0];
4358 	var appt = ZmAppt.createFromDom(apptNode, {list: apptList}, null);
4359 
4360 	var invites = apptNode.inv;
4361 	appt.setInvIdFromProposedInvite(invites, invite);
4362 
4363 	if(callback) {
4364 		callback.run(appt);
4365 	}
4366 };
4367 
4368 ZmCalViewController.prototype._getApptItemInfoErrorHandler =
4369 function(invite, callback, result) {
4370 	var msgDialog = appCtxt.getMsgDialog();
4371 	msgDialog.reset();
4372 	msgDialog.setMessage(ZmMsg.unableToAcceptTime, DwtMessageDialog.INFO_STYLE);
4373 	msgDialog.popup();
4374 	return true;
4375 };
4376 
4377 ZmCalViewController.prototype.acceptProposedTime =
4378 function(apptId, invite, proposeTimeCallback) {
4379 
4380 	this._proposedTimeCallback = proposeTimeCallback;
4381 
4382 	if(apptId) {
4383 		var callback = new AjxCallback(this, this._acceptProposedTimeContinue, [invite]);
4384 		this.getAppointmentByInvite(invite, callback);
4385 	}else {
4386 		var msgDialog = appCtxt.getMsgDialog();
4387 		msgDialog.reset();
4388 		msgDialog.setMessage(ZmMsg.unableToAcceptTime, DwtMessageDialog.INFO_STYLE);
4389 		msgDialog.popup();
4390 	}
4391 };
4392 
4393 ZmCalViewController.prototype._acceptProposedTimeContinue =
4394 function(invite, appt) {
4395 	var mode = appt.isRecurring() ? (appt.isException ? ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SINGLE_INSTANCE : ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SERIES) : ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT;
4396 	appt.setProposedInvite(invite);
4397 	appt.setProposedTimeCallback(this._proposedTimeCallback);
4398 	this.editAppointment(appt, mode);
4399 };

4401 ZmCalViewController.prototype.proposeNewTime =
4402 function(msg) {
4403 	var newAppt = this.newApptObject(new Date(), null, null, msg),
4404         mode = ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT,
4405         apptId = msg.invite.getAppointmentId();
4406 	newAppt.setProposeTimeMode(true);
4407 	newAppt.setFromMailMessageInvite(msg);
4408     if (apptId) {
4409 		var msgId = msg.id;
4410 		var inx = msg.id.indexOf(":");
4411 		var accountId = null;
4412 		if (inx !== -1) {
4413 			accountId = msgId.substr(0, inx);
4414 			msgId = msgId.substr(inx + 1);
4415 		}
4416 		var invId = [apptId, msgId].join("-");
4417 		if (accountId) {
4418 			invId = [accountId, invId].join(":");
4419 		}
4420 		newAppt.invId = invId;
4421         newAppt.getDetails(mode, new AjxCallback(this, this.proposeNewTimeContinue, [newAppt, mode]));
4422     }
4423     else {
4424         newAppt.setViewMode(mode);
4425         AjxDispatcher.run("GetApptComposeController").proposeNewTime(newAppt);
4426     }
4427 };
4428 
4429 ZmCalViewController.prototype.proposeNewTimeContinue =
4430 function(newAppt, mode) {
4431     newAppt.setViewMode(mode);
4432 	AjxDispatcher.run("GetApptComposeController").proposeNewTime(newAppt);
4433 };
4434 
4435 ZmCalViewController.prototype.forwardInvite =
4436 function(msg) {
4437 	var invite = msg.invite;
4438 	var apptId = invite.getAppointmentId();
4439 
4440 	if(apptId && invite.isOrganizer()) {
4441 		var callback = new AjxCallback(this, this.forwardInviteContinue, [invite, msg]);
4442 		this.getAppointmentByInvite(invite, callback);
4443 	}else {
4444 		var newAppt = this.newApptObject(new Date(), null, null, msg);
4445 		newAppt.setForwardMode(true);
4446 		newAppt.setFromMailMessageInvite(msg);
4447 		AjxDispatcher.run("GetApptComposeController").forwardInvite(newAppt);
4448 	}
4449 };
4450 
4451 ZmCalViewController.prototype.forwardInviteContinue =
4452 function(invite, msg, appt) {
4453 	appt.setForwardMode(true);
4454 	appt.setFromMailMessageInvite(msg);
4455 	var mode = appt.isRecurring() ? (appt.isException ? ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SINGLE_INSTANCE : ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT_SERIES) : ZmCalItem.MODE_EDIT;
4456 	var clone = ZmAppt.quickClone(appt);
4457 	clone.getDetails(mode, new AjxCallback(this, this._forwardInviteCompose, [clone]));
4458 };
4459 
4460 ZmCalViewController.prototype._forwardInviteCompose =
4461 function (appt) {
4462 	AjxDispatcher.run("GetApptComposeController").forwardInvite(appt);
4463 };

4465 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getFreeBusyInfo =
4466 function(startTime, endTime, emailList, callback, errorCallback, noBusyOverlay) {
4467 	var soapDoc = AjxSoapDoc.create("GetFreeBusyRequest", "urn:zimbraMail");
4468 	soapDoc.setMethodAttribute("s", startTime);
4469 	soapDoc.setMethodAttribute("e", endTime);
4470 	soapDoc.setMethodAttribute("uid", emailList);
4471 
4472 	var acct = (appCtxt.multiAccounts)
4473 		? this._composeView.getApptEditView().getCalendarAccount() : null;
4474 
4475 	return appCtxt.getAppController().sendRequest({
4476 		soapDoc: soapDoc,
4477 		asyncMode: true,
4478 		callback: callback,
4479 		errorCallback: errorCallback,
4480 		noBusyOverlay: noBusyOverlay,
4481 		accountName: (acct ? acct.name : null)
4482 	});
4483 };
4484 
4485 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getWorkingInfo =
4486 function(startTime, endTime, emailList, callback, errorCallback, noBusyOverlay) {
4487    var soapDoc = AjxSoapDoc.create("GetWorkingHoursRequest", "urn:zimbraMail");
4488    soapDoc.setMethodAttribute("s", startTime);
4489    soapDoc.setMethodAttribute("e", endTime);
4490    soapDoc.setMethodAttribute("name", emailList);
4491 
4492    var acct = (appCtxt.multiAccounts)
4493        ? this._composeView.getApptEditView().getCalendarAccount() : null;
4494 
4495    return appCtxt.getAppController().sendRequest({
4496        soapDoc: soapDoc,
4497        asyncMode: true,
4498        callback: callback,
4499        errorCallback: errorCallback,
4500        noBusyOverlay: noBusyOverlay,
4501        accountName: (acct ? acct.name : null)
4502    });
4503 };

4505 /**
4506  * Sets the current view.
4507  *
4508  * @param {ZmListView} view	the view
4509  */
4510 ZmCalViewController.prototype.setCurrentListView = function(view) {
4511     if (this._currentListView != view) {
4512         // if changing views, de-select items in current view so user doesn't get confused
4513         if (this._currentListView) {
4514             this._currentListView.deselectAll();
4515             this._currentListView.blur();
4516         }
4517         this._currentListView = view;
4518         this._resetToolbarOperations();
4519     }
4520 };
4521 
4522 ZmCalViewController.prototype.getCurrentListView = function() {
4523     return this._currentListView || this.getCurrentView();
4524 };

4526 /**
4527  * Creates appointment as configured in the out-of-office preference
4528  */
4529 ZmCalViewController.prototype.createAppointmentFromOOOPref=
4530 function(startDate, endDate, allDay, respCallback){
4531        var newAppt = new ZmAppt();
4532        newAppt.setAllDayEvent(allDay);
4533 	   newAppt.setStartDate(startDate);
4534 	   newAppt.setEndDate(endDate);
4535        newAppt.name = ZmMsg.outOfOffice;
4536        newAppt.freeBusy = (appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.VACATION_CALENDAR_TYPE)=="BUSY")?"B":"O";
4537        newAppt.message = appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.VACATION_MSG);
4538        newAppt.convertToLocalTimezone();
4539        newAppt.save(null, respCallback);
4540 };
